FormModule.Name: AIRPORT_APPROACH
FormModule.Title: Airport Approach
FormModule.Comment:
--- CPTCODE_23006 ----(This anchor is Deprecated)
 DATA_RIGHTS: HONEYWELL CONFIDENTIAL & PROPRIETARY
 THIS WORK CONTAINS VALUABLE CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY
 INFORMATION. DISCLOSURE, USE OR REPRODUCTION OUTSIDE OF
 HONEYWELL INTERNATIONAL, INC. IS PROHIBITED EXCEPT AS
 AUTHORIZED IN WRITING. THIS UNPUBLISHED WORK IS PROTECTED BY
 THE LAWS OF THE UNITED STATES AND OTHER COUNTRIES. IN THE
 EVENT OF PUBLICATION, THE FOLLOWING NOTICE SHALL APPLY:
 COPR. 2003 HONEYWELL INTERNATIONAL, INC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

*********************************************************************************

Name Date SCR Modification
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Deepika B 03/22/2013 5887.01 Anchor(CPTcode_SDU_00095) is added.

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if instr(:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT,'%') > 0 or
 instr(:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT,'_') > 0 then
 dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
 :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT := null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if instr(:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO,'%') > 0 or
 instr(:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO,'_') > 0 then
 dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
 :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO := null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if instr(:PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT,'%') > 0 or
 instr(:PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT,'_') > 0 then
 dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
 :PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT := null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

Trigger.TriggerText: FMS_DETAILS('FAS_IND','FAS_NAME'); -- Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013

Trigger.TriggerText: FMS_DETAILS('LNAV_VNAV_IND','LNAV_VNAV_NAME'); -- Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Begin Fix SCR 6709.08 -- Madhu --12-Apr-2016
IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
 IF rtrim(:pl_std_approach.specials_ind) IS NULL THEN
 :pl_std_approach.specials_ind := 'N';
 END IF; 
END IF; 
--End Fix SCR 6709.08 -- Madhu --12-Apr-2016

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if rtrim(:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle) is null then
 :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
end if;

Trigger.Name: PRE-TEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :PL_STD_APPROACH.validate_ind = 'I' then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

Relation.Name: PL_STD_APPROACH_PL_STD_APPROAC
Relation.JoinCondition:
pl_std_approach.airport_ident = pl_std_approach_segment.airport_ident and
pl_std_approach.airport_icao = pl_std_approach_segment.airport_icao and
pl_std_approach.approach_ident = pl_std_approach_segment.approach_ident and
pl_std_approach.data_supplier = pl_std_approach_segment.data_supplier and
pl_std_approach.processing_cycle = pl_std_approach_segment.processing_cycle

Relation.Name: RELATION126
Relation.JoinCondition:
pl_std_approach.airport_ident = pl_std_approach_leg.airport_ident and
pl_std_approach.airport_icao = pl_std_approach_leg.airport_icao and
pl_std_approach.approach_ident = pl_std_approach_leg.approach_ident and
pl_std_approach.data_supplier = pl_std_approach_leg.data_supplier and
pl_std_approach.processing_cycle = pl_std_approach_leg.processing_cycle

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT IS NOT NULL AND
 (:SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' or nvl(:pl_std_approach.validate_ind,'N') != 'Y') and
 (:control_block.validated = 'N' or :control_block.temp_dcr != :pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number) then
 -- Record that is changed or not be validated or invalid new
 validate_procedure;
 end if;
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
 if_from_leg_search(2);
 :control_block.temp_dcr := nvl(:pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number,0);
 if :CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS is not null then
 if get_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' then
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_true);
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_true);
 end if; 
 else
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_false);
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
 end if; 
end if;

Trigger.Name: PRE-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
 :pl_std_approach.data_supplier := :global.data_supplier;
 if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
 :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 :pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind := :pl_std_approach.validate_ind;
 :pl_std_approach.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_STD_APPROACH',:pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number); 
 :control_block.VALIDATED := 'N';
 :control_block.STD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
 :pl_std_approach.old_saaar_approach_ind := :pl_std_approach.saaar_approach_ind;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.record_status != 'QUERY' and :system.cursor_block = 'PL_STD_APPROACH' then
 if nvl(:pl_std_approach.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') or
 (nvl(:pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') and
 nvl(:pl_std_approach.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O')) then
 dsp_msg('You can only update the validate_ind to ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'' or ''N''');
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := :pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind;
 end if;
 if :pl_std_approach.validate_ind is null and :pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind is not null then
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := :pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind;
 end if; 
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH.ref_info is not null and 
 :PL_STD_APPROACH.validate_ind in ('W','N','I') then
 :control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := :PL_STD_APPROACH.ref_info;
 set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :PL_STD_APPROACH.validate_ind := :PL_STD_APPROACH.old_validate_ind;
 end if; 
 if :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle is null then
 :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
 end if; 
 if :system.record_status in ('NEW','INSERT') then
 if check_proc_pk = FALSE then
 dsp_msg('This record already exists!');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 :pl_std_approach.data_supplier := :global.data_supplier; 
 if rtrim(:pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number) is null then
 select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number from dual;
 :control_block.temp_dcr := :pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number;
 end if;
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := 'I'; -- no details
 :pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 
 :pl_std_approach.saaar_approach_ind := 'N';
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1; 
 end if;

 if nvl(:pl_std_approach.saaar_approach_ind,'X') not in ('Y','N') then
 dsp_msg('The SAAAR Approach indicator can have only ''Y'' or ''N'' values. Please correct it.');
 :pl_std_approach.SAAAR_APPROACH_IND := :pl_std_approach.OLD_SAAAR_APPROACH_IND;
 end if;

 :control_block.validated := 'N';
 validate_keys;

if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
 (:pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind = 'Y' or :pl_std_approach.validate_ind = 'Y') then
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH.processing_cycle in (:global.new_processing_cycle, :global.old_processing_cycle) then
 refresh_master_library.set_record_group
 (:PL_STD_APPROACH.create_dcr_number,:PL_STD_APPROACH.validate_ind,
 'PL_STD_APPROACH',:PL_STD_APPROACH.processing_cycle,'U');
 end if; 
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-DELETE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :pl_std_approach.validate_ind = 'I' then
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid - 1;
end if;
set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_STD_APPROACH.PL_STD_APPROACH_PL_STD_APPROAC'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_STD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_STD_APPROACH.RELATION126'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
if :PL_STD_APPROACH.validate_ind = 'I' then
 set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
end if;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
if ERROR_CODE = 40200 then
 declare 
 v_message varchar2(1);
 begin
 v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT','C');
 end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');
 If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then 
 dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
 End If;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type != :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type 
 AND (:control_block.pk_aircraft_change = 'Y' or :control_block.pk_transition_change = 'Y' ) then
 
 :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type;
 --:control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident;
 --:control_block.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :control_block.new_aircraft_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 --:pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 --:pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'Y'; -- 5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y'; 
 
ELSIF :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type != :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type THEN
 :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type;
 :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident;
 :control_block.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :control_block.new_aircraft_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'Y'; -- 5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; -- 5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; -- 5699
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Begin Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--20-OCT-2016
GO_ITEM('pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident');
first_record;
LOOP
 IF :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident = :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident THEN
 next_item;
 EXIT;
 ELSE 
 next_record;
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
END LOOP;
--END Fix SCR 6985.01--Ashish N--20-OCT-2016

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
Else
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
End If;
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type is not null then
 if refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT','W') = 'N' then
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE); --65347
 else
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE); --65347
 end if;
-- :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012

end if;
--
if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then 
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 end if;
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 first_record;
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then
 validate_segment;
 if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then
 if check_segment_pk = FALSE then
 dsp_msg('This change will generate a duplicate record! ');
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type;
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident:= :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident;
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type:= :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699 
 end if;
 end if;
 if :pl_std_approach_segment.create_dcr_number is null then
 select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_std_approach_segment.create_dcr_number from dual;
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 end if;
 :control_block.validated := 'N';
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 :pl_std_approach_segment.old_route_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type;
 :pl_std_approach_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_std_approach_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CREREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 lc_cur_rec varchar2(5);
begin 
:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 16-Sep-2012
IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN --Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 26-Sep-2012
 -- Begin Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 18-Jun-2019
 if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'N' and :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' and 
 (:pl_std_approach_segment.old_route_type <> :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type or 
 :pl_std_approach_segment.old_transition_ident <> :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident OR
 :pl_std_approach_segment.old_aircraft_type <> :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type) then --65347
 lc_cur_rec := :system.cursor_record;
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG');
 --dsp_msg('inside loop');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
 --dsp_msg('check');
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 end if;
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 first_record;
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT');
 go_record(lc_cur_rec);
 end if;
 --End Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 18-Jun-2019 
 create_record; 
 go_item('pl_std_approach_segment.route_type');
End If;
end;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
if ERROR_CODE = 40200 then
 declare 
 v_message varchar2(1);
 begin
 v_message := refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG','C');
 end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD'); 
 If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then 
 dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
 End If;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;

Trigger.TriggerText:
--Begin Fix SCR 6626--Madhu-28-Jan-2016
Mag_Course_Prc(:PL_STD_Approach_Leg.Magnetic_Course);

IF LENGTH(:PL_STD_Approach_Leg.Magnetic_Course) > 4 THEN
 dsp_msg('Magnetic Course should not exceed 4 characters');
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
END IF;

Trigger.TriggerText: RNP_Prc(:pl_std_approach_leg.rnp);--Fix SCR 6626--Madhu --28-Jan-2016

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
If :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code is not null then
 -- Fill the character 1 through 4
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc1 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),1,1);
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc2 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),2,1);
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc3 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),3,1);
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc4 := substr(rpad(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),4,1);
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then 
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 end if;
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 first_record;
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.cursor_record != '1' and :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 previous_record;
else 
 if :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num is not null and :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind = 'I' then
 validate_leg;
 else
 set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and rtrim(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT) is not null then
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG',:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.create_dcr_number);
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info is not null then
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 else
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 end if;
 end if;

 -- :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
 IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
 Else
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 End If;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then
 if nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num, '-1') != '-1' then
 if nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') then
 dsp_msg('Validate indicator can only ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'',''N'' or ''I''');
 :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind := null;
 end if;
 if :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind in ('I','W','N') and :pl_std_approach.ref_info is not null then
 :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind := null;
 end if; 
 if :system.record_status in ('NEW','INSERT') then
 :pl_std_approach_leg.file_recno := 0;
 if rtrim(:pl_std_approach_leg.create_dcr_number) is null then
 select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_std_approach_leg.create_dcr_number from dual;
 end if;
 end if; 
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE is null and
 nvl(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.CENTER_FIX_IDENT,'NOPT') != 'NOPT' and 
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION != 'RF' then
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE := '0';
 end if; 
 validate_leg; 
 :control_block.validated := 'N';
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CREREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012

IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 -- To provide a sequence number for a new record
 if get_block_property('pl_std_approach_leg',current_record) = 1 and 
 :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 go_block('pl_std_approach_segment');
 first_record;
 if :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type is not null then 
 go_block('pl_std_approach_leg');
 :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type;
 :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident := :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident; 
 :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num := 10;
 else
 if message_code = 40102 THEN
 clear_message;
 end if;
 message('Please create the segment first.');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 else
 DECLARE
 new_seq number(3);
 pre_seq number(3);
 transition_ident varchar2(5);
 route_type varchar2(1);
 aircraft_type VARCHAR2(1); --65347
 BEGIN
 pre_seq := :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num;
 transition_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident;
 route_type := :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type;
 aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
 next_record;
 if route_type != :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type or
 transition_ident != :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident or
 aircraft_type != :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type or --65347
 :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 new_seq := pre_seq + 10;
 else
 new_seq := floor((pre_seq + :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num)/2);
 end if; 
 Previous_Record;
 create_record; 
 :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type := route_type;
 :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident := transition_ident;
 :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type := aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num := new_Seq;
 END;
 end if; 
 go_item('pl_std_approach_leg.fix_ident');
END IF; -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012

Trigger.Name: KEY-DOWN
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null and :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.path_and_termination is null then
 null;
else
 DECLARE
 pre_seq number(3);
 transition_ident varchar2(5);
 route_type varchar2(1);
 aircraft_type varchar2(1); --65347
 BEGIN
 pre_seq := :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num;
 transition_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident;
 route_type := :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type;
 aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
 next_record;
 if :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type := route_type;
 :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident := transition_ident;
 :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type := aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num := pre_seq + 10;
 end if;
 go_item('pl_std_approach_leg.fix_ident');
 END;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-UP
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION is null and
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null AND :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.create_dcr_number is null then --Fix SCR 6460--Madhu--9-Jun-2021
 clear_record;
 if :system.last_record != 'TRUE' then
 previous_record;
 end if;
else
 previous_record;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT,'%') > 0 or
 instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT,'_') > 0 then
 dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT := null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;
--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
DECLARE
 v_flag NUMBER;
 v_allow_update NUMBER := 0;
 v_block_name VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
BEGIN
 v_allow_update := 0;

 IF :SYSTEM.record_status IN ('NEW', 'INSERT') THEN
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
 IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
 v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
 ELSE
 v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
 END IF;
 ELSE
 IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
 v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
 ELSE
 v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
 END IF;
 END IF;

 IF :global.data_supplier IN ('J', 'L', 'E') THEN
 IF v_Flag IN (6, 4, 3, 2, 1) THEN
 v_allow_update := 1;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle; --7607
 --:control_block.comp_cycle := get_cycle; --7607
 :parameter.comp_cycle := get_cycle;--8002
 ELSIF v_Flag = 0 THEN
 IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
 ELSE
 dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
 END IF;
 RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
 ELSIF :global.data_supplier IN ('Q', 'N')THEN
 IF v_Flag = 5 THEN
 v_allow_update := 1;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle; --7607
 --:control_block.comp_cycle := get_cycle; --7607
 :parameter.comp_cycle := get_cycle;--8002
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 ls_Return VARCHAR2(1);--Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015
BEGIN
 IF rtrim(:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle) IS NULL THEN
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
 ELSE
--Begin Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015 
 ls_Return := DCR_Effective_Cycle_Fun(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle);
 IF ls_Return = 'N' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;
--End Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT,'%') > 0 or
 instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT,'_') > 0 then
 dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT := null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

--Begin Fix SCR 7607 --Madhu
DECLARE
 ls_icao VARCHAR2 (2);
BEGIN

 ls_icao :=
 populate_airport_icao (RTRIM (:pl_tld_approach.airport_ident),
 RTRIM (:pl_tld_approach.airport_icao),
 :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle,
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag, 'Y'));

 IF ls_icao = '--' THEN
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao := NULL;
 ELSE
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao := ls_icao;
 END IF;

END;
--End Fix SCR 7607--Madhu

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO,'%') > 0 or
 instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO,'_') > 0 then
 dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO := null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

if instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT,'%') > 0 or
 instr(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT,'_') > 0 then
 dsp_msg('Wildcard ''%'' and/or ''_'' is not allowed.');
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT := null;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 if rtrim(:PL_TLD_approach.generated_in_house_flag) is null then
 :PL_TLD_approach.generated_in_house_flag := 'Y';
 end if; 
end if;

Trigger.TriggerText:
--Begin Fix SCR 6709.08 -- Madhu --12-Apr-2016
IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
 IF rtrim(:pl_tld_approach.specials_ind) IS NULL THEN
 :pl_tld_approach.specials_ind := 'N';
 END IF; 
END IF; 
--End Fix SCR 6709.08 -- Madhu --12-Apr-2016

Trigger.Name: PRE-TEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :PL_TLD_APPROACH.validate_ind = 'I' and
 :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag = 'N' then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

Relation.Name: PL_TLD_APPROACH_PL_TLD_APPROAC
Relation.JoinCondition:
pl_tld_approach.airport_ident = pl_tld_approach_segment.airport_ident and
pl_tld_approach.airport_icao = pl_tld_approach_segment.airport_icao and
pl_tld_approach.approach_ident = pl_tld_approach_segment.approach_ident and
pl_tld_approach.data_supplier = pl_tld_approach_segment.data_supplier and
pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle = pl_tld_approach_segment.processing_cycle and
pl_tld_approach.customer_ident = pl_tld_approach_segment.customer_ident

Relation.Name: RELATION127
Relation.JoinCondition:
pl_tld_approach.airport_ident = pl_tld_approach_leg.airport_ident and
pl_tld_approach.airport_icao = pl_tld_approach_leg.airport_icao and
pl_tld_approach.approach_ident = pl_tld_approach_leg.approach_ident and
pl_tld_approach.data_supplier = pl_tld_approach_leg.data_supplier and
pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle = pl_tld_approach_leg.processing_cycle and
pl_tld_approach.customer_ident = pl_tld_approach_leg.customer_ident

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT IS NOT NULL AND 
 (:SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' or nvl(:pl_tld_approach.validate_ind,'N') != 'Y') and
 (:control_block.validated = 'N' or :control_block.temp_dcr != :pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number) then
 validate_procedure;
 end if;
 --
 --:control_block.comp_cycle := get_cycle; --7607
 :parameter.comp_cycle := get_cycle;--8002
 if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 if :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag = 'N' then
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'default');
 else
 if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag = 'Y' then
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
 else 
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'default');
 end if; 
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'default');
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
 end if;
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 end if;
 if_from_leg_search(2);
 :control_block.temp_dcr := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number,0);
 if :CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS is not null then
 if get_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' then
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_true);
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_true);
 end if; 
 else
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',ENABLED, property_false);
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
 end if; 
end if;

Trigger.Name: PRE-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
 :pl_tld_approach.data_supplier := :global.data_supplier;
 if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 :pl_tld_approach.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle;
 :pl_tld_approach.old_g_in_house := :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag;
 :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind := :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind;
 :pl_tld_approach.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_TLD_APPROACH',:pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number);
 :control_block.VALIDATED := 'N';
 :control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.record_status != 'QUERY' and :system.cursor_block = 'PL_TLD_APPROACH' then
 if nvl(:pl_tld_approach.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') or
 (nvl(:pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') and
 nvl(:pl_tld_approach.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O')) then
 dsp_msg('You can only update the validate_ind to ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'' or ''N''');
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind;
 end if;
 if :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind is null and :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind is not null then
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind;
 end if;
 if :pl_tld_approach.ref_info is not null and 
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind in ('W','N','I') then
 :control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := :pl_tld_approach.ref_info;
 set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind;
 end if; 
 validate_extra_fields(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle,:PL_TLD_APPROACH.generated_in_house_flag); 
 if :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
 if :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_approach.old_processing_cycle then
 if check_proc_pk = FALSE then
 dsp_msg('This change will generate a duplicate record! ');
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.old_processing_cycle;
 else
 if :pl_tld_approach.ref_info is not null THEN
 :control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS := :pl_tld_approach.ref_info;
 set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.old_processing_cycle;
 end if; 
 END IF;
 end if;
 else
 if check_proc_pk = FALSE then
 dsp_msg('This record already exist!');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 :pl_tld_approach.data_supplier := :global.data_supplier;
 if rtrim(:pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number) is null then
 select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number from dual;
 :control_block.temp_dcr := :pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number;
 end if;
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'I'; -- no details
 :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
 end if; 
 :control_block.validated := 'N';
 validate_keys;
 if :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
 if :control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS is not null and :PL_TLD_APPROACH.ref_info is not null then
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG := :PL_TLD_APPROACH.OLD_G_IN_HOUSE;
 else
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH.OLD_G_IN_HOUSE != :PL_TLD_APPROACH.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG or
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_approach.old_processing_cycle then
 -- Reset the old values 
 :pl_tld_approach.old_g_in_house := :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag; 
 :pl_tld_approach.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.flag_change := 'Y';
 end if;
 end if;
 end if; 
 if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
 (:pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind = 'Y' or :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind = 'Y') then
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle in (:global.new_processing_cycle, :global.old_processing_cycle) then
 refresh_master_library.set_record_group
 (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.create_dcr_number,:PL_TLD_APPROACH.validate_ind,
 'PL_TLD_APPROACH',:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle,'U');
 end if;
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-DELETE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind = 'I' then
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid - 1;
end if;
set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_TLD_APPROACH.PL_TLD_APPROACH_PL_TLD_APPROAC'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE is not null) or (:PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PL_TLD_APPROACH.RELATION127'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
if :PL_TLD_APPROACH.validate_ind = 'I' then
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
end if;

if ERROR_CODE = 40200 then
 declare 
 v_message varchar2(1);
 begin

 end;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');
 If :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' Then 
 dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
 name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
 End If;
-- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 04-Oct-2012
end if;

 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; -- 5699

ELSIF :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type != :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type THEN

 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE; --65347
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'Y';
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';

--65347
IF :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE != :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE 
 AND (:control_block.pk_transition_change = 'Y' OR :control_block.pk_route_change = 'Y') then --5699
-- :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type;
 --:control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident;
 :control_block.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
 :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :control_block.NEW_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
 --:pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 --:pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'Y';
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
ELSIF :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE != :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE THEN
 :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type;
 :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident;
 :control_block.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
 :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :control_block.NEW_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'Y';
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
END IF;
--65347

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident != :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident then
 :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type;
 :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident;
 :control_block.old_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.new_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :control_block.new_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :control_block.new_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'Y';
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
 Else
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 End If;
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type is not null then
 if refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT','W') = 'N' then
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE); --65347
 else
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.AIRCRAFT_TYPE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE); --65347 
 end if;

end if;
if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then 
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 end if;
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 first_record;
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then
 validate_segment;
 if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then
 
 
 if check_segment_pk = FALSE then
 dsp_msg('This change will generate a duplicate record! ');
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident:= :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.aircraft_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N'; 
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699 
 end if;
 end if;
 if :pl_tld_approach_segment.create_dcr_number is null then
 select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_tld_approach_segment.create_dcr_number from dual;
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.generated_in_house_flag := :PL_TLD_APPROACH.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.old_transition_ident:= :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 end if; 
 :control_block.validated := 'N'; 
end if;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.old_route_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type;
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.old_aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :control_block.old_route_type := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.route_type;
 :control_block.old_transition_ident := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.transition_ident;
 :control_block.OLD_AIRCRAFT_TYPE := :pl_tld_APPROACH_segment.AIRCRAFT_TYPE;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CREREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 lc_cur_rec varchar2(5);
begin 
:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 16-Sep-2012
IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN --Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 26-Sep-2012
 -- Begin Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 18-Jun-2019
 if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'N' and :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' and 
 (:pl_tld_approach_segment.old_route_type <> :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type or 
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.old_transition_ident <> :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident or
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.old_aircraft_type <> :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type) then --65347
 lc_cur_rec := :system.cursor_record;
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG');
 --dsp_msg('inside loop');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then --65347
 --dsp_msg('check');
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 end if;
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 first_record;
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT');
 go_record(lc_cur_rec);
 end if;
 --End Fix SCR 4905 -- Venkat M 18-Jun-2019 
 
 create_record; 
 go_item('pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type');
End If;
end;

Trigger.TriggerText:
--Begin Fix SCR 6984.01--Madhu--01-SEP-2016
DECLARE
 ls_ICAO PL_TLD_AIRPORT.AIRPORT_ICAO%TYPE;
 ls_Sec PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE%TYPE;
 ls_Sub_Sec PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE%TYPE;
 lb_Dummy BOOLEAN;
BEGIN
IF :PARAMETER.FIX_LOV = 'N' THEN -- Fix scr 7218 Venkat M 19-OCT-2017 
 --check
 fix_value_prc(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT,:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT,
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT,:PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO,
 Name_IN('global.data_supplier'),:PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE,
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE,:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE,
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE);
 --:PARAMETER.FIX_LOV := 'N'; --commented
END IF; 
:PARAMETER.FIX_LOV := 'N'; -- Fix scr 7218 Venkat M 19-OCT-2017
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE := '';
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
 :PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO := :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO; --scr 7218
 lb_Dummy :=Show_LOV('FIX_LOV');
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
END;
--End Fix SCR 6984.01--Madhu--01-SEP-2016

Trigger.TriggerText:
If :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code is not null then
 -- Fill the character 1 through 4
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc1 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),1,1);
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc2 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),2,1);
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc3 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),3,1);
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc4 := substr(rpad(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),4,1);
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 if :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' then 
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type and
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident AND 
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type then
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 end if;
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 end loop; 
 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 first_record;
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.cursor_record != '1' and :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 previous_record;
else
 if :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num is not null and :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind = 'I' then
 validate_leg;
 else
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and rtrim(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT) is not null then
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info := get_ref_info('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG',:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.create_dcr_number);
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info is not null then
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 else
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_ICAO_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 end if;
 if :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag = 'N' then
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 set_item_property('pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 end if;
 -- :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
 IF :System.Record_Status IN ('INSERT','NEW') THEN 
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
 Else
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'UPD');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 End If;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.block_status != 'QUERY' then
 if nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num, '-1') != '-1' then
 if nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind,'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') then
 dsp_msg('Validate indicator can only ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'',''N'' or ''I''');
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind := null;
 end if;
 if :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind in ('I','W','N') and :pl_tld_approach.ref_info is not null then
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind := null;
 end if;
 if :system.record_status in ('NEW','INSERT') then
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.file_recno := 0;
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.generated_in_house_flag := :PL_TLD_APPROACH.GENERATED_IN_HOUSE_FLAG;
 if rtrim(:pl_tld_approach_leg.create_dcr_number) is null then
 select dcr_number_seq.nextval into :pl_tld_approach_leg.create_dcr_number from dual;
 end if;
 end if; 
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE is null and
 nvl(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.CENTER_FIX_IDENT,'NOPT') != 'NOPT' and 
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION != 'RF' then
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE := '0';
 end if;
 validate_leg;
 :control_block.validated := 'N';
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-DOWN
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :pl_tld_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null and :pl_tld_APPROACH_LEG.path_and_termination is null then
 null;
else
 DECLARE
 pre_seq number(3);
 transition_ident varchar2(5);
 route_type varchar2(1);
 aircraft_type VARCHAR2(1); --65347
 BEGIN
 pre_seq := :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num;
 transition_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident;
 route_type := :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type;
 aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
 next_record;
 if :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type := route_type;
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident := transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type := aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num := pre_seq + 10;
 end if;
 go_item('pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_ident');
 END;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-CREREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
:parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN --Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 -- To provide a sequence number for a new record
 if get_block_property('pl_tld_approach_leg',current_record) = 1 and 
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 go_block('pl_tld_approach_segment');
 first_record;
 if :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type is not null then 
 go_block('pl_tld_approach_leg');
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type;
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident := :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident; 
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num := 10;
 else
 if message_code = 40102 THEN
 clear_message;
 end if;
 message('Please create the segment first.');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 else
 DECLARE
 new_seq number(3);
 pre_seq number(3);
 transition_ident varchar2(5);
 route_type varchar2(1);
 aircraft_type varchar2(1); --65347
 BEGIN
 pre_seq := :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num;
 transition_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident;
 route_type := :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type;
 aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
 next_record;
 if route_type != :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type or
 transition_ident != :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident or
 aircraft_type != :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type or --65347
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num is null then
 new_seq := pre_seq + 10;
 else
 new_seq := floor((pre_seq + :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num)/2);
 end if; 
 Previous_Record;
 create_record; 
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type := route_type;
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident := transition_ident;
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type := aircraft_type; --65347
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num := new_Seq;
 END;
 end if; 
 go_item('pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_ident');
END IF; -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012

Trigger.Name: KEY-UP
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.PATH_AND_TERMINATION is null and
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE is null and :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.create_dcr_number is null then -- Fix SCR 6460 --9-Jun-2021--Madhu
 clear_record;
 if :system.last_record != 'TRUE' then
 previous_record;
 end if;
else
 previous_record;
end if;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('STD_APPROACH.STD_APPROACH_STD_APPROACH_S'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin STD_APPROACH_LEG detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO is not null) or (:STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT is not null) or (:STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('STD_APPROACH.STD_APPROACH_STD_APPROACH_LEG'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'STD_APPROACH_LEG'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End STD_APPROACH_LEG detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

first_record;
LOOP
 IF :std_approach_segment.transition_ident = :std_approach_leg.transition_ident THEN

 EXIT;
 ELSE

 EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
If :STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code is not null then
 -- Fill the character 1 through 4
 :STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc1 := substr(rpad(:STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),1,1);
 :STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc2 := substr(rpad(:STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),2,1);
 :STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc3 := substr(rpad(:STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),3,1);
 :STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc4 := substr(rpad(:STD_APPROACH_LEG.waypoint_desc_code,4),4,1);
end if;
 
-- Begin Fix - SCR 6366.01 - Eswar KC
-- To pupoluate the Fix Lat/Lan in the legs for Master Library Standard Approach Only.
IF :STD_APPROACH_LEG.CYCLE_IND <> 'O' THEN
 BEGIN
 IF :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Ident NOT LIKE 'RW%' THEN
 SELECT Latitude, Longitude
 INTO :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Latitude, :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Longitude
 FROM V_Std_Fixes -- Fix - SCR 6480.00 - Eswar KC 
 WHERE Data_Supplier = :GLOBAL.Data_Supplier
 AND Fix_Ident = :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Ident
 AND Fix_Icao = :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Icao_Code
 AND Fix_Section = :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Section_Code
 AND NVL (Fix_Subsection, '$') = NVL (:Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Subsection_Code, '$');
 ELSIF :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Ident LIKE 'RW%' THEN
 SELECT Latitude, Longitude
 INTO :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Latitude, :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Longitude
 FROM V_Std_Fixes -- Fix - SCR 6480.00 - Eswar KC 
 WHERE Data_Supplier = :GLOBAL.Data_Supplier
 AND Fix_Ident = :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Ident
 AND Airport_Ident = :Std_Approach_Leg.Airport_Ident
 AND Fix_Icao = :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Icao_Code
 AND Fix_Section = :Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Section_Code
 AND NVL (Fix_Subsection, '$') = NVL (:Std_Approach_Leg.Fix_Subsection_Code, '$');
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 6366.01 - Eswar KC

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE 
 ls_Airport_Ident Pl_Tld_Approach.Airport_Ident%TYPE;
 ls_Airport_Icao Pl_Tld_Approach.Airport_Icao%TYPE;
 ls_Data_Supplier Pl_Tld_Approach.Data_Supplier%TYPE;
 ln_Processing_Cycle Pl_Tld_Approach.Processing_Cycle%TYPE;
 ls_Customer_Ident Pl_Tld_Approach.Customer_Ident%TYPE;
 ls_Plotting_Function_Command VARCHAR2(600);
 ls_Plotting_Function_Dir VARCHAR2(600); 
 ls_Form_Name VARCHAR2(100);
 ls_Table_Name VARCHAR2(100);
 ls_Query VARCHAR2(100);
 ls_Call_Plotting_Function PLS_INTEGER := 1; 
 ls_Call_Plotting_Function1 PLS_INTEGER;
 ln_Record_Count NUMBER;
 ls_Form_Id FORMMODULE;
 MY_PROCESS_ID WEBUTIL_HOST.PROCESS_ID;
 ls_Plot_URL VARCHAR2(1024);--Fix SCR 6088 -Madhu --03-Oct-2013 
BEGIN
 ls_Form_Id := FIND_FORM( lower('AIRPORT_APPROACH'));
 BEGIN
 ls_Plotting_Function_Dir := PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.GetInstallationDir;
 Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter := NVL(PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.ltab_Process_ID.COUNT, 0) + 1;
 -- FORMS11g PITSS ln_Record_Count := PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.Get_Process_Count;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 ls_Plotting_Function_Dir := 'C:\Program Files\Honeywell Inc., Aviation Services\CorePTDU Tool\';
 ln_Record_Count := 1;
 END; 

 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' AND :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
 ls_Table_Name := 'PL_STD_APPROACH';
 ln_Processing_Cycle := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DATABASE_VALUE);
 
 ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'T' AND :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
 ls_Table_Name := 'PL_TLD_APPROACH';
 ln_Processing_Cycle := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DATABASE_VALUE);
 ls_Customer_Ident := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT' ,DATABASE_VALUE);
 
 ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'S' AND :parameter.library_access = 'MASTER' THEN
 ls_Table_Name := 'STD_APPROACH';
 
 ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'T' AND :parameter.library_access = 'MASTER' THEN
 ls_Table_Name := 'TLD_APPROACH';
 ls_Customer_Ident := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT',DATABASE_VALUE);
 END IF;
 ls_Form_Name := ls_Table_Name;
 
 ls_Airport_Ident := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.AIRPORT_IDENT',DATABASE_VALUE);
 ls_Airport_Icao := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.AIRPORT_ICAO' ,DATABASE_VALUE);
 ls_Data_Supplier := Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'.DATA_SUPPLIER',DATABASE_VALUE);
 
 ls_Query := ls_Data_Supplier
 ||','||ls_Airport_Icao
 ||','||ls_Airport_Ident
 ||','||ln_Processing_Cycle
 ||','||ls_Customer_Ident;

 IF ln_Record_Count >= 10 THEN
 dsp_msg('Attn !!!! Maximum of 10 Plot Windows are already opened, please close atleast one Plot Window to open new Plot Window');
 ELSE 
 
 IF ls_Airport_Ident IS NOT NULL AND
 ls_Airport_Icao IS NOT NULL AND
 ls_Data_Supplier IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 ls_Table_Name := ls_Table_Name||'_LEG';
 
 IF ls_Query IS NOT NULL THEN
 Fetch_Plotting_Data.Get_Record_Count(ls_Query,ls_Table_Name,ln_Record_Count);
 ELSE
 ln_Record_Count := 0; 
 END IF; 
 
 IF ln_Record_Count > 0 THEN 
--Begin Fix SCR 6088 -Madhu --03-Oct-2013
 ls_Plot_URL:=:GLOBAL.ls_Plot_URL||'?username='||:global.user_name
 ||'&password='||:global.password
 ||'&connectstr='||:global.connect_string
 ||'&datatype='||ls_Table_Name
 ||'&query='||ls_Query;
 
 IF :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.gearth = 'Y' THEN
 WEB.SHOW_DOCUMENT(ls_Plot_URL,'_blank'); 
 -- WEB.SHOW_DOCUMENT ('javascript:window.open("'||ls_Plot_URL||'","","location=no,fullscreen=yes,toolbar=no,menubar=no,status=no,top=0,left=0,resizable=yes,height=600,width=800");self.close()','_blank'); 

 ELSE
--End Fix SCR 6088 -Madhu --03-Oct-2013 
 ls_Plotting_Function_Command := ls_Plotting_Function_Dir||'CorePTDU.exe'
 ||' -user:'||:global.user_name
 ||' -password:'||:global.password
 ||' -connectstr:'||:global.connect_string
 ||' -datatype:'||ls_Table_Name
 ||' -query:'||ls_Query; 
 --message(ls_Plotting_Function_Command); 
 --ls_Call_Plotting_Function1 := Plot_
 -- FORMS 11g PITSS
 --message(ls_Plotting_Function_Command);synchronize;pause;
 MY_PROCESS_ID := WEBUTIL_HOST.NonBlocking(ls_Plotting_Function_Command);
--Global_Pkg.WinExec(ls_Plotting_Function_Command, ls_Call_Plotting_Function); 
 
 BEGIN
 Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter).ln_Process_ID 
 := TO_NUMBER (MY_PROCESS_ID.handle); 
 Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter).ls_DataType 
 := TO_CHAR(ls_Form_Id.ID);
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END; 
 END IF;--Fix SCR 6088 -Madhu --03-Oct-2013
 GO_BLOCK(ls_Form_Name); 
 ELSE
 dsp_msg('Invalid/No Data to plot');
 END IF; 
 
 ELSE
 dsp_msg('Invalid/No Data to plot'); 
 END IF; 
 
 END IF;
 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 total_rows number;
 V_BUTTON NUMBER(1);
begin
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 dsp_msg('There is changes in the form, please do commit first.');
 else 
 total_rows := get_group_row_count(find_group('Refresh_Records_Group'));
 v_button := display_alert.more_buttons('S','Refresh Record',
 'You have modified or inserted or deleted '||total_rows||' record(s). '||chr(10)||
 'Do you want to refresh the Master Library now?'||chr(10)||chr(10),
 'Refresh', 'Cancel');
 if v_button = 1 then
 refresh_master_library.refresh_records(total_rows);
 else
 null;
 end if;
 end if; 
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: POPULATE_ITEMS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POPULATE_ITEMS(mname IN varchar2) IS
 scr_description varchar2(100);
 scr_part_number varchar2(100);
BEGIN 
 get_module_information(mname, scr_description, scr_part_number);
--Begin Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
 IF Name_In('parameter.work_type') = 'VIEW' THEN
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := substr(scr_description,1,instr(scr_description,'/')-1)||substr(scr_description,instr(scr_description,'/')+7);
 ELSE
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := scr_description;
 END IF;
--End Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DATE_TIME := to_char(sysdate,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS');
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_NAME := mname;
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_PART_NUMBER := scr_part_number;
 BEGIN
 select data_supplier_name
 into :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE
 from data_supplier
 where data_supplier = nvl(:GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER,'T');
 Exception
 When no_data_found then
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE := :GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER;
 End; 
 select decode(nvl(:parameter.record_type,'S'),'S','STANDARD','T','TAILORED','UNKNOWN')||', '||:parameter.library_access||', '||
 decode(nvl(:parameter.work_type,'VIEW'),'VIEW','Query Only','Data Entry')
 into :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_RECORD_TYPE
 from dual;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INITIALIZE_FORM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INITIALIZE_FORM IS
 fname varchar2(100) := get_application_property(CURRENT_FORM_NAME);
 wn_id window := Find_Window('BASE_WINDOW');
 v_name varchar2(50) := get_window_property(wn_id, TITLE);
 v_block varchar2(30) := Get_Form_Property(fname,FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
 v_err varchar2(300);
BEGIN
 
 default_value('J','global.data_supplier');
 default_value('I','global.lib_refreshed');
 default_value('99999','global.dcr_number');
 default_value('200303','global.processing_cycle');
 default_value('N','global.from_error_summary');
 default_value('200406','global.recent_cycle');
 default_value('MAXIMIZE','global.Status_Window'); 
 default_value(null,'global.customer_ident');
 default_value(null,'global.allroles');
 default_value('N','global.is_admin');
 default_value('N','global.from_leg_search');
 /*********************************************************************/
 /*********************************************************************/
 /* Global Variables declared Plotting Function- updated as part of scr 2303.00 */
 -- Declaring Common variables
 default_value('cpt','global.user_name');
 default_value('cpt','global.password');
 default_value('cpt','global.connect_string');
 default_value('airport','global.data_type');
 default_value('airport','global.table_name');
 default_value('ml','global.schema_type');
 default_value('blank','global.last_query'); 
 :global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
 :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
 :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING); 
 /*********************************************************************/
 /*********************************************************************/
 
 :global.Status_Window := get_window_property('BASE_WINDOW',window_state);
 if name_in('global.Status_Window') = 'MAXIMIZE' then
 set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, MAXIMIZE);
 else
 set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, NORMAL);
 end if;
 --set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_SIZE, 760, 440);
 
 -- activate all roles
 v_err := set_role(:global.allroles);
 if v_err != 'PASSED' then
 -- The roles cannot be activated
 display_alert.one_button('S','Fatal Error',
 'The roles cannot be activated. Contact the COREPT Administrator.');
 exit_form;
 else
-- Continue
 if :global.processing_cycle is null then
 begin
 select max(processing_cycle) 
 into :global.processing_cycle
 from pl_std_airport;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 :global.processing_cycle := null;
 end;
 end if;
 :global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
 :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
 :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING);


 if substr(v_block,1,3) in ('PL_','STD','TLD') then
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 v_name := 'STD '||v_name;
 elsif :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
 v_name := 'TLD '||v_name;
 end if;
 if :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
 v_name := 'PL '||v_name;
 else
 v_name := 'ML '||v_name;
 end if;
 end if; 
 set_window_property(wn_id, TITLE, v_name);
 
/*
 IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
 set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle;
 END IF;
*/
 
 IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN -- MOD
 activate_role;
 set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
 set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 60); -- MOD
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle; -- MOD
 elsif :global.new_processing_cycle != 111111 then -- MOD
 set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
 set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 80); -- MOD
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.old_processing_cycle||' - '||:global.new_processing_cycle; -- MOD
 end if; -- MOD

 populate_items(fname);
 unset_query_menu_items;
 
 if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 -- Create the Refresh Records Group
 declare
 group_id recordgroup;
 col1_id groupcolumn;
 col2_id groupcolumn;
 col3_id groupcolumn;
 col4_id groupcolumn;
 begin 
 group_id := create_group('Refresh_Records_Group');
 col1_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'dcr_number',number_column);
 col2_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'table_name',char_column,30);
 col3_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'valida_ind',char_column,1);
 col4_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'proc_cycle',number_column);
 end;
 end if;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DSP_ERROR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE DSP_ERROR(ERR_MSG IN VARCHAR2) IS
 alert_id alert;
 choice number(3);
BEGIN
 set_alert_property('ERROR_MESSAGE', alert_message_text,ERR_MSG); 
 alert_id := find_alert ('ERROR_MESSAGE');
 choice := show_alert(alert_id);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POPULATE_REL_RECORD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*
 SCR 0126 --Madhu -- 15-Apr-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form from 229A to 236 Builds(SCR no's 3476,5359,5332,5294)
 
*/
PROCEDURE populate_rel_record 
 (p_record out cpt_types.rec_proc_rdv,
 p_table out varchar2,
 p_dcr out number) IS
BEGIN
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 p_table := 'pl_std_approach_leg';
 p_dcr := :pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number;
 p_record.cfixicao := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
 p_record.cfixid := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_ident;
 p_record.cfixsec := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_section;
 p_record.cfixsubsec := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection;
 p_record.mult_code := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE,'0');
 p_record.path_and_term := :pl_std_approach_leg.path_and_termination;
 p_record.fixicao := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_icao_code;
 p_record.fixid := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_ident;
 p_record.fixsec := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_section_code;
 p_record.fixsubsec := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code;
 p_record.recommicao := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
 p_record.recommid := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
 p_record.recommsec := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
 p_record.recommsubsec := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection;
 p_record.airport_icao := :pl_std_approach.airport_icao;
 p_record.airport_ident := :pl_std_approach.airport_ident;
 p_record.v_procedure_ident:= :pl_std_approach.APPROACH_IDENT;
 p_record.cust_area_code := :pl_std_approach.area_code;
 p_record.generated_in_house_flag := 'N';
