 p_record.validate_ind := :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind;
 p_record.v_rowid := null;
 p_record.cdcr := :pl_std_approach_leg.create_dcr_number;
 p_record.route_type := :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type;
 p_record.v_procedure_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.approach_ident;
 p_record.waypoint_desc_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code;
 p_record.primary_approach_ind := :pl_std_approach.primary_approach_ind; -- Fix - SCR 3476 - 03-Oct-2011 
 p_record.Magnetic_Course := :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.Magnetic_Course; --Fix - SCR 4721.03 - Madhu - 26-Nov-2013
 else
 p_table := 'pl_tld_approach_leg';
 p_dcr := :pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number;
 p_record.cfixicao := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
 p_record.cfixid := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_ident;
 p_record.cfixsec := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_section;
 p_record.cfixsubsec := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection;
 p_record.mult_code := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.CENTER_FIX_MULTIPLE_CODE,'0');
 p_record.path_and_term := :pl_tld_approach_leg.path_and_termination;
 p_record.fixicao := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_icao_code;
 p_record.fixid := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_ident;
 p_record.fixsec := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_section_code;
 p_record.fixsubsec := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code;
 p_record.recommicao := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
 p_record.recommid := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
 p_record.recommsec := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
 p_record.recommsubsec := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection;
 p_record.airport_icao := :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao;
 p_record.airport_ident := :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident;
 p_record.v_procedure_ident:= :pl_tld_approach.APPROACH_IDENT;
 p_record.cust_area_code := :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident;
 p_record.generated_in_house_flag := :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag;
 p_record.validate_ind := :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind;
 p_record.v_rowid := null;
 p_record.cdcr := :pl_tld_approach_leg.create_dcr_number;
 p_record.route_type := :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type;
 p_record.v_procedure_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.approach_ident;
 p_record.waypoint_desc_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code;
 p_record.primary_approach_ind := :pl_tld_approach.primary_approach_ind; -- Fix - SCR 3476 - 03-Oct-2011 
 p_record.magnetic_course := :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.Magnetic_Course; --Fix - SCR 4721.03 - Madhu - 26-Nov-2013
 end if; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_LEG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*
 SCR 0126 --Madhu -- 15-Apr-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form from 229A to 236 Builds(SCR no's 3476,5359,5332,5294)
 
*/
/*
 SCR 0155 --Madhu -- 25-June-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form for the 238 Build(SCR no's 5549)
 
*/
PROCEDURE validate_leg(p_ignore_ref varchar2 := 'Y') IS
 v_record sdv_records.cr_airport_procedure; 
 v_err_ind number := 0;
 v_err_list cpt_types.errlist_type;
 v_err varchar2(200) := null;
 v_rerr varchar2(10); --Fix - SCR 4721.03 - Madhu - 26-Nov-2013 //--Increased size to 7 as part of scr 3476 - 03-Oct-2011 - Eswar KC
 v_all_err varchar2(32000) := null;--Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
 v_nerr number := 0;
 v_valid varchar2(1);
 v_rel_rec cpt_types.rec_proc_rdv;
 v_exist number;
 v_cycle number(6);
 v_processing_cycle number(6);
 v_table varchar2(30);
 v_dcr number;
 v_leg_ind varchar2(1) := 'Y';
BEGIN
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'BUSY');
 -- Check structural
 populate_record(v_record, v_cycle, v_processing_cycle); 
 RECSV2.VAIRPORT_PROCEDURE(:global.data_supplier, v_cycle, v_record,v_err_list,v_err_ind);

 -- Check the result
 IF v_err_ind != 0 THEN
 for i in 1..v_err_list.count loop
/* Commented as part of the - Begin Fix - SCR 6617.08, ARINC20:SCR 8.05 - Eswar KC - 08-May-2015
--Begin Fix - SCR 5549 - Eswar KC - June - 04 - 2012; Here Excluding the validation for the Route type H for TLD Approach only. 
 If :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.ROUTE_TYPE = 'H' and v_err_list(i) = 354 then --Fix SCR 5852 -- Eswar KC -- Segment block is changed to Leg
 null;
 Else
--End Fix - SCR 5549 - Eswar KC - June - 04 - 2012 
*/ -- End Fix - SCR 6617.08, ARINC20:SCR 8.05 - Eswar KC - 08-May-2015
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err_list(i)) then
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||to_char(v_err_list(i))||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_list(i));
 v_leg_ind := 'I';
 else
 if v_leg_ind != 'I' then
 v_leg_ind := 'O';
 end if; 
 end if;
 -- End if; -- Fix - SCR 5549 - Eswar KC - June - 04 - 2012, -- Fix - SCR 6617.08, ARINC20:SCR 8.05 - Eswar KC - 08-May-2015 
 end loop;
 END IF;
 if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
 set_update_dcr(upper(:system.cursor_block),v_record);
 end if;

 -- Check relational 

 populate_rel_record(v_rel_rec,v_table,v_dcr);

 recrv2.vairport_procedure(v_table,:global.data_supplier,v_cycle,:parameter.record_type,
 v_rel_rec,v_dcr,v_rerr,v_valid,p_ignore_ref,'D','DU'); -- 7607 --'D' indicates that this procedure is getting called from DU - scr 3476

 --if substr(v_rerr,2,5) != 'YYYYY' then
 if v_rerr like '%N%' then --Modified as part of scr 3476 - 03-Oct-2011 - Eswar KC
 if substr(v_rerr,2,1) = 'N' then
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 475 - '||get_err_text(475);
 end if; 
 if substr(v_rerr,3,1) = 'N' then
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 476 - '||get_err_text(476);
 end if; 
 if substr(v_rerr,4,1) = 'N' then
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 477 - '||get_err_text(477);
 end if; 
 if substr(v_rerr,5,1) = 'N' then
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 467 - '||get_err_text(467);
 end if; 
 if substr(v_rerr,6,1) = 'N' then
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 459 - '||get_err_text(459);
 end if; 
 if substr(v_rerr,7,1) = 'N' then
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 485 - '||get_err_text(485);
 end if;
 --Begin Fix - SCR 4721.03 - Madhu - 26-Nov-2013
 IF SUBSTR(v_rerr,8,1) = 'N' THEN
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * 1167 - '||get_err_text(1167);
 END IF;
 --End Fix - SCR 4721.03 - Madhu - 26-Nov-2013
 end if;
 -- 

 if v_all_err is not null then
 if v_record.transition_ident = '-' and v_record.route_type != 'A' then
 :control_block.temp_errors := '* Approach Common: '||chr(10)||'Seq#'||v_record.sequence_num||' -> '||v_all_err||chr(10);
 else

 :control_block.temp_errors := '* Route '''||v_record.route_type||''', Transition '''||v_record.transition_ident||
 ''': '||chr(10)||'Seq#'||v_record.sequence_num||' -> '||v_all_err||chr(10);
 end if;
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 :control_block.std_leg_errors := v_all_err;
 
 if nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind,'N') != 'I' then
 :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind := 'I';
 end if;
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH.ref_info is null then
 if nvl(:pl_std_approach.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := 'I';
 :pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
 end if;
 else
 :control_block.std_validation_errors := :PL_STD_APPROACH.ref_info;
 set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 end if;
 else
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :control_block.tld_leg_errors := v_all_err;
 if nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind,'N') != 'I' then
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind := 'I';
 end if;
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH.ref_info is null then
 if nvl(:pl_tld_approach.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'I';
 :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
 end if;
 else
 :control_block.tld_validation_errors := :PL_TLD_APPROACH.ref_info;
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 end if;
 end if;
 else 
 :control_block.temp_errors := null;
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 if nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind,'I') = 'I' then
 :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
 else
 if (:pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind = 'Y' and v_leg_ind = 'O') or
 (:pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind = 'O' and v_leg_ind = 'Y') then
 :pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 elsif :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
 if nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind,'I') = 'I' then
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
 else
 if (:pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind = 'Y' and v_leg_ind = 'O') or
 (:pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind = 'O' and v_leg_ind = 'Y') then
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind := v_leg_ind;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if; 
 end if; 
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_PROCEDURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/* Formatted on 3/21/2013 8:02:35 AM (QP5 v5.163.1008.3004) */
PROCEDURE validate_procedure (p_ignore_ref VARCHAR2 := 'Y')
IS
 v_all_err VARCHAR2 (32000) := NULL; --Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Eswar KC
 v_proc_err VARCHAR2 (32000) := NULL; --Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
 cursor_block VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
 cursor_record VARCHAR2 (4) := :SYSTEM.cursor_record;
 cursor_item VARCHAR2 (100) := :SYSTEM.cursor_item;
 v_detail_ind VARCHAR2 (6) := '------';
 v_master_ind VARCHAR2 (6) := '------';
 v_button NUMBER (1);
 v_segs cpt_types.table_vchar30;
 v_seg_exist VARCHAR2 (1) := 'N';
 v_index NUMBER := 0;
 v_proc_type VARCHAR2 (1);
 v_global_364 VARCHAR2 (3) := NULL; -- Fix - SCR 5762.00 - Madhu - 28-JAN-2013
 v_global_1163 VARCHAR2 (1) := NULL; -- Fix - SCR 5751.03 - Eswar KC - 20-Mar-2013
 v_global_1164 VARCHAR2 (1) := NULL; -- Fix - SCR 5751.03 - Eswar KC - 20-Mar-2013
 v_global_err VARCHAR2 (8000); -- Fix - SCR 5751.03 - Eswar KC - 20-Mar-2013
 ls_valid_ind VARCHAR2(1000);--Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017 
BEGIN
 --:CONTROL_BLOCK.temp_faf := NULL; -- Fix SCR 5762 --Madhu--28-JAN-2013
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'BUSY');

 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' THEN
 :CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := NULL;
 ELSE
 :CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := NULL;
 END IF;

 :control_block.warning_msg := NULL;
 -- Validate keys
 validate_keys (p_ignore_ref);
 v_all_err := :control_block.temp_errors;

 IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' AND p_ignore_ref = 'N' THEN
 refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table ( NAME_IN ( SUBSTR (:SYSTEM.cursor_block, 1, 15) || '.create_dcr_number'));
 END IF;
 
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' THEN
 --set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 --:control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := 'W O R K I N G ! Please wait.';
 v_master_ind := set_validate_ind (:pl_std_approach.validate_ind, v_master_ind);
 
 -- Validate all segments
 GO_BLOCK ('pl_std_approach_segment');

 IF ERROR_CODE IN (40209, 50016) THEN
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;

 FIRST_RECORD;

 IF :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type IS NOT NULL THEN
 LOOP
 
 v_index := v_index + 1;
 v_segs (v_index) := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type || ',' || :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident||','||:pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 validate_segment (p_ignore_ref);

 IF :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type NOT IN ('A', 'Z') THEN
 v_proc_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type;
 END IF;

 v_all_err := v_all_err || :control_block.temp_errors;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;

 -- Validate all legs

 recsv2.vset_global_constant (364); -- Fix - SCR 5762 - Madhu - 28-JAN-2013 
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (1163); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (1164); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (99999); --Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013
 Magnetic_Course_SDV_Prc(:parameter.record_type);--Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013
 
 GO_BLOCK ('pl_std_approach_leg');
 FIRST_RECORD;

 IF :PL_STD_approach_leg.sequence_num IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' THEN
 FIRST_RECORD;
 LOOP
 IF :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type
 AND :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident
 AND :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type --65347
 THEN
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 END IF;

 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;

 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 
 END IF;

 FIRST_RECORD;

 LOOP
 validate_leg (p_ignore_ref);
 v_seg_exist := 'N';
 
 v_global_364 := recsv2.vget_global_constant (364); -- Fix SCR 5762 --Madhu--28-JAN-2013 
 v_global_1163 := recsv2.vget_global_constant (1163); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 v_global_1164 := recsv2.vget_global_constant (1164); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013

 FOR i IN 1 .. v_index
 LOOP
 IF :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type || ',' || :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident||','||:pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type = v_segs (i) THEN --65347
 v_seg_exist := 'Y';
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 IF v_seg_exist = 'N' THEN
 IF v_all_err IS NULL OR LENGTH(v_all_err)<30000 THEN --Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013 
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err || ' * Segment '|| :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type|| ' Transition Ident '|| :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident||' Aircraft Type '||:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type --65347
 || ', Seq #'|| :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.sequence_num|| '--> '|| TO_CHAR (5630)|| ' - '|| get_err_text (5630)|| CHR (10);
 END IF;
 END IF;

 IF :control_block.temp_errors IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_all_err := SUBSTR(v_all_err || :control_block.temp_errors,1,30000);--Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
 END IF;

 v_detail_ind := set_validate_ind (:pl_std_approach_leg.validate_ind, v_detail_ind);
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;

 -- Validate procedure
 check_procs.v_one_proc ('S',
 'APPROACH',
 'A',
 :pl_std_approach.airport_ident,
 :pl_std_approach.airport_icao,
 :pl_std_approach.approach_ident,
 :pl_std_approach.area_code,
 :pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number,
 :pl_std_approach.data_supplier, --:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle,
 v_proc_err,
 v_proc_type);
 --Begin Fix SCR 6696.03 -- Venkat M --04-Aug-2015 
 IF INSTR(v_proc_err,get_err_text(357)) > 0 THEN
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := 'I';
 END IF;
 --End Fix SCR 6696.03 --Venkat M --04-Aug-2015


 --Begin Fix SCR 5762 --Madhu--28-JAN-2013
 IF v_global_364 LIKE '%N%' THEN
 v_global_err := v_global_err||' * 364 - ' || get_err_text (364) || CHR (10); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 END IF;
 --End Fix SCR 5762 --Madhu--28-JAN-2013
 --Begin Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 IF v_global_1163 = 'Y' THEN
 v_global_err := v_global_err||' * 1163 - ' || get_err_text (1163) || CHR (10); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 END IF;
 IF v_global_1164 = 'N' THEN
 v_global_err := v_global_err||' * 1164 - ' || get_err_text (1164) || CHR (10); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 END IF; 
 --End Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 ELSE
 v_all_err := v_all_err || ' ** This Procedure has no legs! ';
 END IF;
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.tld_validation_errors', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.tld_validation_errors', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);

 :control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS := 'W O R K I N G ! Please wait.';
 v_master_ind := set_validate_ind (:pl_tld_approach.validate_ind, v_master_ind);
 -- Validate all segments
 GO_BLOCK ('pl_tld_approach_segment');

 IF ERROR_CODE IN (40209, 50016) THEN
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;

 FIRST_RECORD;

 IF :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type IS NOT NULL THEN
 LOOP
 
 IF :pl_tld_approach.flag_change = 'Y' THEN
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.generated_in_house_flag := :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag;
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle;
 END IF;

 v_index := v_index + 1;
 v_segs (v_index) := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type || ',' || :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident||','||:pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 validate_segment (p_ignore_ref);

 IF :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type NOT IN ('A', 'Z') THEN
 v_proc_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type;
 END IF;
 
 v_all_err := v_all_err || :control_block.temp_errors;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;

 -- Validate all legs
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (364); -- Fix - SCR 5763 - Madhu - 05-Jun-2013 
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (1163); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (1164); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (99999); --Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013
 Magnetic_Course_SDV_Prc(:parameter.record_type);--Fix --SCR 4721.03 - Madhu -26-Nov-2013

 GO_BLOCK ('pl_tld_approach_leg');
 FIRST_RECORD;

 IF :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 
 IF :control_block.pk_segment_change = 'Y' OR :pl_tld_APPROACH.flag_change = 'Y' THEN
 FIRST_RECORD;

 
 LOOP
 IF :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :control_block.old_route_type
 AND :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :control_block.old_transition_ident
 AND :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type = :control_block.old_aircraft_type --65347
 THEN
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type := :control_block.new_route_type;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident := :control_block.new_transition_ident;
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type := :control_block.new_aircraft_type; --65347
 END IF;

 :pl_tld_approach_leg.generated_in_house_flag := :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag;
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;

 :control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
 :pl_tld_APPROACH.flag_change := 'N';
 :control_block.pk_route_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_transition_change := 'N'; --5699
 :control_block.pk_aircraft_change := 'N'; --5699
 END IF;
 --

 FIRST_RECORD;
 LOOP
 validate_leg (p_ignore_ref);
 v_seg_exist := 'N';
 
 v_global_364 := recsv2.vget_global_constant (364); -- Fix SCR 5763 --Madhu--05-Jun-2013
 v_global_1163 := recsv2.vget_global_constant (1163); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 v_global_1164 := recsv2.vget_global_constant (1164); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013

 FOR i IN 1 .. v_index
 LOOP
 IF :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type || ',' || :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident||','||:pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type = v_segs (i) THEN --65347
 v_seg_exist := 'Y';
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 IF v_seg_exist = 'N'
 THEN
 IF v_all_err IS NULL OR LENGTH(v_all_err)<30000 THEN --Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013 
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err || ' * Route ' || :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type || ' Transition ' || :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident||' Aircraft Type '||:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.aircraft_type --65347
 || ', Seq #' || :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.sequence_num || '--> ' || TO_CHAR (5630) || ' - ' || get_err_text (5630) || CHR (10);
 END IF;
 END IF;

 v_all_err := SUBSTR(v_all_err || :control_block.temp_errors,1,30000);--Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
 v_detail_ind := set_validate_ind (:pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind, v_detail_ind);
 ls_valid_ind := ls_valid_ind||:pl_tld_approach_leg.validate_ind;--Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017 
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;

 -- Validate procedure
 check_procs.v_one_proc ('T',
 'APPROACH',
 'A',
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao,
 :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number,
 :pl_tld_approach.data_supplier, --:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle,
 v_proc_err,
 v_proc_type);
 
 --Begin Fix SCR 6696.03 -- Venkat M --04-Aug-2015 
 
 IF INSTR(v_proc_err,get_err_text(357)) > 0 THEN
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'I';
 END IF;
 --End Fix SCR 6696.03 --Venkat M --04-Aug-2015
 
 --Begin Fix SCR 5763 --Madhu--05-Jun-2013
 IF v_global_364 LIKE '%N%' THEN
 v_global_err := v_global_err||' * 364 - ' || get_err_text (364) || CHR (10);
 END IF;
 --End Fix SCR 5763 --Madhu--05-Jun-2013
 --Begin Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 IF v_global_1163 = 'Y' THEN
 v_global_err := v_global_err||' * 1163 - ' || get_err_text (1163) || CHR (10); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 END IF;
 IF v_global_1164 = 'N' THEN
 v_global_err := v_global_err||' * 1164 - ' || get_err_text (1164) || CHR (10); -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 END IF; 
 --End Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 ELSE
 v_all_err := v_all_err || ' ** This Procedure has no legs! ';
 END IF;
 END IF;
--Begin Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017
 IF :control_block.temp_field = 'Y' AND INSTR(ls_valid_ind,'I')>0 THEN 
 v_all_err := v_all_err||'* This Approach has been locked by other user. Please exit from the form without saving '||chr(10);
 :control_block.temp_field := 'N';
 END IF;
--End Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017
--Begin Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
 IF LENGTH(NVL(v_all_err,0)) IS NOT NULL THEN 
 IF LENGTH(v_all_err || v_proc_err || v_global_err) < 30000 THEN
 v_all_err := v_all_err || v_proc_err || v_global_err; 
 ELSIF LENGTH(v_all_err || v_proc_err || v_global_err) >= 30000 THEN
 v_all_err := SUBSTR(v_all_err || v_proc_err || v_global_err,1,30000)||'.....'; --:control_block.temp_faf; --Fix SCR 5762 --Madhu--28-JAN-2013 -- Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5751.03 - 21-Mar-2013
 END IF;
 END IF;
--End Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu--28-AUG-2013
 
 GO_BLOCK (cursor_block);

 IF cursor_block NOT LIKE '%APPROACH' THEN
 GO_RECORD (cursor_record);
 END IF;

 GO_ITEM (cursor_item);

 IF RTRIM (NAME_IN (SUBSTR (cursor_block, 1, 15) || '_leg.SEQUENCE_NUM')) IS NOT NULL THEN
 validate_leg ('Y');
 END IF;

 -- Set validate indicator of the Master record
 Set_Master (p_ignore_ref, SUBSTR (cursor_block, 1, 15), v_all_err, :parameter.work_type, v_master_ind, v_detail_ind);
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
 --

 IF :control_block.warning_msg IS NOT NULL THEN
 dsp_msg (:control_block.warning_msg);
 END IF;
 
 :control_block.validated := 'Y';
 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PROCS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE check_procs IS
 
 Type segs_table is table of check_procedures.segrec 
 index by binary_integer; 
 
 Procedure v_one_proc 
 (p_record_type in varchar2, -- S for standard, T for tailored
 p_proc in varchar2, -- sid, star, approach
 p_terminal_type in varchar2, -- A - airport, H - heliport
 p_terminal_ident in varchar2, -- Airport/Heliport ident
 p_terminal_icao in varchar2, -- Airport/Heliport ICAO code
 p_proc_ident in varchar2, -- Procedure ident
 p_cust in varchar2, -- Customer ident
 p_dcr in number, 
 p_supplier in varchar2, 
 --p_cycle in number,
 p_error_list out varchar2,
 p_proc_type in varchar2);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PROCS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*
 SCR 0148 --Madhu -- 06-June-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done for Production SCR 5328 
*/
PACKAGE BODY CHECK_PROCS IS

 Procedure fill_segs
 (p_record_type in varchar2,
 p_segs out segs_table,
 p_nsegs out number,
 p_app_common_route out varchar2,
 p_app_common_Q1 out varchar2) IS
 v_index number := 0;
 begin
 if p_record_type = 'S' then
 -- Process Standard data
 go_block('pl_std_approach_leg');
 first_record;
 go_block('pl_std_approach_segment');
 first_record;
 if :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type is not null then
 loop
 v_index := v_index + 1;
 p_segs(v_index).procedure_type := 'APPROACH';
 p_segs(v_index).record_type := p_record_type;
 p_segs(v_index).terminal_type := 'A';
 p_segs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident;
 p_segs(v_index).route_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type;
 p_segs(v_index).aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 p_segs(v_index).apch_route_qualifier_1 := nvl(:pl_std_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1,' ');
 p_segs(v_index).apch_route_qualifier_2 := nvl(:pl_std_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2,' ');
 p_segs(v_index).procedure_ident := :pl_std_approach.approach_ident;
 p_segs(v_index).terminal_ident := :pl_std_approach.airport_ident;
 p_segs(v_index).terminal_icao := :pl_std_approach.airport_icao;
 if p_app_common_route is null and :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type != 'A' then
 p_app_common_route := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type;
 p_app_common_Q1 := :pl_std_approach_segment.APCH_ROUTE_QUALIFIER_1;
 end if; 
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 first_record;
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;
 p_nsegs := v_index;
 else
 -- Process Tailored data
 go_block('pl_tld_approach_leg');
 first_record;
 go_block('pl_tld_approach_segment');
 first_record;
 if :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type is not null then
 loop
 v_index := v_index + 1;
 p_segs(v_index).procedure_type := 'APPROACH';
 p_segs(v_index).record_type := p_record_type;
 p_segs(v_index).terminal_type := 'A';
 p_segs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident;
 p_segs(v_index).route_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type;
 p_segs(v_index).aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 p_segs(v_index).apch_route_qualifier_1 := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1,' ');
 p_segs(v_index).apch_route_qualifier_2 := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2,' ');
 p_segs(v_index).procedure_ident := :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident;
 p_segs(v_index).terminal_ident := :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident;
 p_segs(v_index).terminal_icao := :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao;
 if p_app_common_route is null and :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type != 'A' then
 p_app_common_route := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type;
 p_app_common_Q1 := :pl_tld_approach_segment.APCH_ROUTE_QUALIFIER_1;
 end if; 
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 first_record;
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;
 p_nsegs := v_index;
 end if; 
 end fill_segs;
 
 Procedure fill_legs
 (p_record_type in varchar2,
 p_rt in varchar2, -- route type
 p_ti in varchar2, -- transition ident
 p_at in varchar2, --65347
 p_legs out check_procedures.legs_table,
 p_nlegs out number) IS
 v_index number := 0;
 begin
 if p_record_type = 'S' then
 -- Process Standard data
 go_block('pl_std_approach_leg');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident = p_ti and
 :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type = p_rt AND 
 :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type = p_at then --65347
 v_index := v_index + 1;
 p_legs(v_index).procedure_type := 'APPROACH';
 p_legs(v_index).record_type := p_record_type;
 p_legs(v_index).terminal_type := 'A';
 p_legs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).route_type := :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type;
 p_legs(v_index).aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
 p_legs(v_index).procedure_ident := :pl_std_approach.approach_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).terminal_ident := :pl_std_approach.airport_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).terminal_icao := :pl_std_approach.airport_icao;
 p_legs(v_index).sequence_num := :pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num;
 p_legs(v_index).alt_1 := :pl_std_approach_leg.alt_1;
 p_legs(v_index).alt_2 := :pl_std_approach_leg.alt_2;
 p_legs(v_index).alt_description := :pl_std_approach_leg.alt_description;
 p_legs(v_index).arc_radius := :pl_std_approach_leg.arc_radius;
 p_legs(v_index).atc_ind := :pl_std_approach_leg.atc_ind;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_icao_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_multiple_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_section := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_section;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_subsection := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection;
 p_legs(v_index).cycle_data := :pl_std_approach_leg.cycle_data;
 p_legs(v_index).file_recno := :pl_std_approach_leg.file_recno;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_icao_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_icao_code;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_section_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_section_code;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_subsection_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code; 
 p_legs(v_index).magnetic_course := :pl_std_approach_leg.magnetic_course;
 p_legs(v_index).path_and_termination := :pl_std_approach_leg.path_and_termination;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_icao_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_section := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_subsection := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection; 
 p_legs(v_index).rho := :pl_std_approach_leg.rho;
 p_legs(v_index).rnp := :pl_std_approach_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 --p_legs(v_index).rnp2 := :pl_std_approach_leg.rnp2;
 --p_legs(v_index).rnp3 := :pl_std_approach_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 p_legs(v_index).route_distance := :pl_std_approach_leg.route_distance;
 p_legs(v_index).speed_limit := :pl_std_approach_leg.speed_limit;
 p_legs(v_index).theta := :pl_std_approach_leg.theta;
 p_legs(v_index).trans_altitude := :pl_std_approach_leg.trans_altitude;
 p_legs(v_index).turn_dir_valid := :pl_std_approach_leg.turn_dir_valid;
 p_legs(v_index).turn_direction := :pl_std_approach_leg.turn_direction;
 p_legs(v_index).vertical_angle := :pl_std_approach_leg.vertical_angle;
 p_legs(v_index).waypoint_desc_code := rpad(:pl_std_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4);
 end if;
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 first_record;
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 p_nlegs := v_index;
 else
 -- Process Tailored data
 go_block('pl_tld_approach_leg');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident = p_ti and
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type = p_rt AND 
 :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type = p_at then --65347
 v_index := v_index + 1;
 p_legs(v_index).procedure_type := 'APPROACH';
 p_legs(v_index).record_type := p_record_type;
 p_legs(v_index).terminal_type := 'A';
 p_legs(v_index).transition_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).route_type := :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type;
 p_legs(v_index).aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_leg.aircraft_type; --65347
 p_legs(v_index).procedure_ident := :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).terminal_ident := :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).terminal_icao := :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao;
 p_legs(v_index).sequence_num := :pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num;
 p_legs(v_index).alt_1 := :pl_tld_approach_leg.alt_1;
 p_legs(v_index).alt_2 := :pl_tld_approach_leg.alt_2;
 p_legs(v_index).alt_description := :pl_tld_approach_leg.alt_description;
 p_legs(v_index).arc_radius := :pl_tld_approach_leg.arc_radius;
 p_legs(v_index).atc_ind := :pl_tld_approach_leg.atc_ind;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_icao_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_multiple_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_section := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_section;
 p_legs(v_index).center_fix_subsection := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection;
 p_legs(v_index).cycle_data := :pl_tld_approach_leg.cycle_data;
 p_legs(v_index).file_recno := :pl_tld_approach_leg.file_recno;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_icao_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_icao_code;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_section_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_section_code;
 p_legs(v_index).fix_subsection_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code;
 p_legs(v_index).magnetic_course := :pl_tld_approach_leg.magnetic_course;
 p_legs(v_index).path_and_termination := :pl_tld_approach_leg.path_and_termination;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_icao_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_section := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
 p_legs(v_index).recomm_navaid_subsection := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection;
 p_legs(v_index).rho := :pl_tld_approach_leg.rho;
 p_legs(v_index).rnp := :pl_tld_approach_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 --p_legs(v_index).rnp2 := :pl_tld_approach_leg.rnp2;
 --p_legs(v_index).rnp3 := :pl_tld_approach_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 p_legs(v_index).route_distance := :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_distance;
 p_legs(v_index).speed_limit := :pl_tld_approach_leg.speed_limit;
 p_legs(v_index).theta := :pl_tld_approach_leg.theta;
 p_legs(v_index).trans_altitude := :pl_tld_approach_leg.trans_altitude;
 p_legs(v_index).turn_dir_valid := :pl_tld_approach_leg.turn_dir_valid;
 p_legs(v_index).turn_direction := :pl_tld_approach_leg.turn_direction;
 p_legs(v_index).vertical_angle := :pl_tld_approach_leg.vertical_angle;
 p_legs(v_index).waypoint_desc_code := rpad(:pl_tld_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4);
 end if;
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 first_record;
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 p_nlegs := v_index;
 end if;
 end fill_legs;
 
 
 Procedure v_one_proc 
 (p_record_type in varchar2, -- S for standard, T for tailored
 p_proc in varchar2, -- sid, star, approach
 p_terminal_type in varchar2, -- A - airport, H - heliport
 p_terminal_ident in varchar2, -- Airport/Heliport ident
 p_terminal_icao in varchar2, -- Airport/Heliport ICAO code
 p_proc_ident in varchar2, -- Procedure ident
 p_cust in varchar2, -- Customer ident
 p_dcr in number, 
 p_supplier in varchar2, 
 p_error_list out varchar2,
 p_proc_type in varchar2) is
 v_legs check_procedures.legs_table; -- Legs Table - holds all legs belonging to the current segment
 v_segs segs_table; -- Segs table - holds all segs belonging to the current proc
 v_nsegs number; -- Number of segments
 v_nlegs number; -- Number of legs within current segment
 v_err number;
 v_all_errors varchar2(32000) := null;--Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
 v_is_map boolean; -- TRUE for Missed Approach, FALSE for not a Missed Approach
 v_mleg number; -- The leg number of a Missed Approach point 
 v_exception exception;
 --v_exist_A varchar2(1) := 'N'; -- Mod for SCR695
 --v_exist_alpha varchar2(1):= 'N'; -- Mod for SCR695
 v_exist_route varchar2(3) := 'NNN';-- mod 9
 v_mag_course_1 number; -- Mod 4
 v_mag_course_2 number; -- Mod 4
 v_mag_course_diff number; -- Mod 4
 v_distance number; -- Mod 9
 -- Following prameters are added per SCR 749, mod 12
 v_is_common boolean := false;
 v_overfly boolean := true;
 v_fix_1 varchar2(10);
 v_fix_2 varchar2(10);
 V_THETA_ON_CF varchar2(1);
 v_ctl_tran varchar2(1);
 v_bearing_3 number;
 v_errlist cpt_types.errlist_type;
 rseg check_procedures.segrec1; -- sesha today
 v_seq number(4);
 v_err_num number(4);
 v_cycle number(6);
 v_processing_cycle number(6);
 v_in_house varchar2(1);
 v_app_common_route varchar2(1);
 v_app_common_Q1 varchar2(1);
 v_s1 varchar2(10);
 v_s2 varchar2(10);
 ls_Proc_Err VARCHAR2(32000) := NULL; -- Fix SCR 5990 --Madhu --29-Sep-2013
 ls_Error NUMBER DEFAULT NULL; -- Fix - SCR 6695, ARINC20:SCR 7.03 - Eswar KC -22-May-2015 
 ls_Flag NUMBER := 0; --Fix SCR 6696.03 - Venkat M -28-July-2015
 ls_Primary_MAP NUMBER :=0; --Fix SCR 6443.02 --Madhu -- 26-Jul-2016
 --65347
 v_star_transition VARCHAR2(3000) := ',';
 v_sid_transition VARCHAR2(3000) := ',';
 v_appr_transition VARCHAR2(3000) := ',';
 v_transition_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(3000) := ',';
 -- v_common_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(3000);
 v_invalid_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(1):= 'N';
 --65347
--SCR 6146--Madhu

 v_invalid_values VARCHAR2(4000) := NULL; 
 v_common_aircraft_type VARCHAR2(4000) := NULL;
--SCR 6146--Madhu 
 
 
--
 begin
 fill_segs(p_record_type, v_segs, v_nsegs, v_app_common_route,v_app_common_Q1);
 if v_nsegs = 0 then -- Added on 01/20/2002
 ls_Proc_Err := '* '||to_char(5640)||' - '||get_err_text(5640);
 raise v_exception; -- Added on 01/20/2002
 end if;
 if p_record_type = 'S' then
 v_processing_cycle := nvl(rtrim(:PL_STD_APPROACH.processing_cycle),:global.processing_cycle);
 if :global.recent_cycle >= v_processing_cycle then
 v_cycle := v_processing_cycle;
 else
 v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
 end if;
 v_in_house := 'N';
 else
 v_processing_cycle := nvl(rtrim(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle),:global.processing_cycle);
 /* if :global.recent_cycle >= v_processing_cycle then
 v_cycle := v_processing_cycle;
 else
 v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
 end if; */ --7607
 v_cycle := v_processing_cycle; --7607
 v_in_house := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag,'Y');
 end if;
 for i in 1..v_nsegs loop
 --
 rseg.route_type := v_segs(i).route_type;
 rseg.transition_ident := v_segs(i).transition_ident;
 rseg.aircraft_type := v_segs(i).aircraft_type; --65347
 rseg.apch_route_qualifier_1 := v_segs(i).apch_route_qualifier_1;
 rseg.apch_route_qualifier_2 := v_segs(i).apch_route_qualifier_2;
 --
 if v_segs(i).route_type = 'A' then -- mod 9
 v_exist_route := 'A'||substr(v_exist_route,2,2);
 elsif v_segs(i).route_type between 'B' and 'Y' then
 v_exist_route := substr(v_exist_route,1,1)||'Y'||substr(v_exist_route,3,1);
 elsif v_segs(i).route_type = 'Z' then -- mod 9
 v_exist_route := substr(v_exist_route,1,2)||'Z'; -- mod 9 
 end if;
 --Begin SCR 6443.02 -- Madhu
 IF v_segs(i).route_type = 'Z' AND v_segs(i).apch_route_qualifier_2 = 'A' THEN
 ls_Primary_MAP:=ls_Primary_MAP+1;
 END IF; 
 --End SCR 6443.02 -- Madhu
--65347 
 IF v_segs(i).route_type NOT IN ('A','Z') THEN
 
 IF instr(NVL(v_appr_transition,'*'),v_segs(i).transition_ident) = 0 THEN
 v_appr_transition := v_appr_transition||v_segs(i).transition_ident||',';
 ELSE 
 IF NOT UTIL1.IS_OVERRIDE_ERROR(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 5679) THEN -- Mod 14
 
 ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||'* Route Type '''||v_segs(i).route_type||''', Transition '''||
 v_segs(i).transition_ident||''' -> '||to_char(5679)||' - '||get_err_text(5679)||chr(10);
 
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 
 v_common_aircraft_type := v_segs(i).aircraft_type; 
 
 ELSE 
 v_transition_aircraft_type := v_transition_aircraft_type||v_segs(i).aircraft_type||','; 
 END IF;
--65347 
 fill_legs(p_record_type, v_segs(i).route_type, v_segs(i).transition_ident,v_segs(i).aircraft_type, --65347
 v_legs, v_nlegs);
 if v_nlegs = 0 then -- Added on 01/20/2002
 ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||'* Route Type '''||v_segs(i).route_type||''', Transition '''||
 v_segs(i).transition_ident||''' -> '||''', Aircraft Type '''||
 v_segs(i).aircraft_type||''' -> '||to_char(1000)||' - '||get_err_text(1000);
 raise v_exception; -- Added on 01/20/2002
 end if;
 
 -- Start mod 12, per SCR 749
 v_is_map := false;
 -- Check if missed approach
 for i in 1..v_nlegs loop
 if (substr(v_legs(i).waypoint_desc_code,3,1) = 'M') then
 v_is_map := TRUE;
 v_mleg := i;
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;
 --
 -- Begin SCR 6443.02 --Madhu --26-Jul-2016
 FOR i IN 1..v_nlegs LOOP
 IF v_legs(i).route_type NOT IN ('Z','A') AND SUBSTR(v_legs(i).waypoint_desc_code,3,1) = 'M' THEN
 ls_Primary_MAP:=ls_Primary_MAP+1;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 --End SCR 6443.02 --Madhu --26-Jul-2016
 chkprc_util.check_approach_legs(p_record_type,
 p_supplier,
 v_cycle,
 p_cust,
 v_in_house,
 p_terminal_ident,
 p_terminal_icao,
 p_proc_ident,
 rseg,
 v_legs,
 v_nlegs,
 v_is_map,
 v_mleg,
 v_app_common_route,
 v_app_common_Q1,
 v_is_common,
 v_overfly,
 v_ctl_tran,
 v_fix_1,
 v_fix_2,
 V_THETA_ON_CF,
 v_errlist,
 v_err,
 'DU'); --7607
 if v_err = 1 then
 -- write error log
 for i in 1..v_errlist.count loop
 v_err_num := to_number(substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),1,4));
 
 IF NOT ( p_record_type = 'T' and ( (v_err_num = 5607 and to_number(substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),5,1)) = 1)
 or v_err_num in (5574,5592) ) ) THEN
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err_num) then
 if substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),5) != '0' then
 v_seq := v_legs(to_number(substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),5))).SEQUENCE_NUM;
 else
 v_seq := null;
 end if; 
 if v_seq is not null then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_seq||' - '||
 to_char(v_err_num)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_num)||chr(10);
 else
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err_num)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_num)||chr(10);
 end if; 
 end if; 
 END IF;
 end loop;
 end if;
 -- End of mod 12, per SCR 749 

 -- Start Changes for SCR 6696.03 
 --Addded the Validation for Error id 357 to Allow Runway records without Altitude1 Coded on Missed Approach
 ls_Flag := 0;
 IF UPPER(p_proc) = 'APPROACH' THEN
 FOR i IN 1..v_nlegs LOOP
 v_err := 0;
 BEGIN
 IF SUBSTR (v_legs (i).waypoint_desc_code, 4, 1) = 'M'
 AND ls_Flag = 0
 AND v_legs (i).route_type <> 'Z'
 THEN
 ls_Flag := 1;

 IF SUBSTR (v_legs (i).waypoint_desc_code, 1, 1) = 'G'
 AND v_legs (i).ALT_1 IS NULL
 AND v_legs (i).route_type <> 'Z'
 THEN
 v_err := 357;
 END IF;
 ELSIF SUBSTR (v_legs (i).waypoint_desc_code, 1, 1) = 'G'
 AND v_legs (i).ALT_1 IS NULL
 AND v_legs (i).route_type <> 'Z'
 THEN
 v_err := 357;
 ELSE
 v_err := 0;
 END IF;
 IF v_err > 0
 THEN
 IF NOT is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) THEN
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||' - '||
 to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
 
 END IF;

 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN ls_flag = 1; 
 END;

 END LOOP;
 END IF; 
 --End changes for SCR 6696.02 
 
 -- Check current segment
 if v_nlegs > 1 then
 -- Check leg sequence
 for i in 2..v_nlegs loop
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_leg_sequence(v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination,
 v_legs(i).path_and_termination);
 if v_err > 0 then
 -- SCR 1022.01 #4 - Check if TF-DF 
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'TF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'DF' and
 substr(v_legs(i-1).waypoint_desc_code,2,1) in ('B','Y') then
 -- Allow this combination
 null;
 else
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 -- Add the error to v_all_errors
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i-1).sequence_num||' - '||
 to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||
 ': The leg '''||v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||''' '||
 ' is followed by '''||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||''''||chr(10); 
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
 -- SCR 6055--Madhu--12-Jan-2021 
 IF v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'PI' AND v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'CF' and v_legs(i).Turn_Direction IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 IF NOT is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 1187) THEN
 
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i-1).sequence_num||' - '||
 to_char(1187)||' - '||get_err_text(1187)||chr(10); 
 
 END IF;
 
 END IF;
 -- SCR 6055--Madhu--12-Jan-2021 
 
 -- Start changes for SCR 4795
 -- ARINC 424 Attachment 5 Leg Sequencing section. 
 -- The IF leg is coded only when the altitude constraints at each end of the 'FX','HX' or 'PI' leg or different
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'IF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination in ('FA','FC','FD','FM','HA','HF','HM','PI') AND
 NVL(v_legs(i-1).alt_description,'$') = NVL(v_legs(i).alt_description,'$') THEN
 select Decode ( (SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i-1).alt_1)),'0'),1,2)) , 'FL' ,(SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i-1).alt_1)),'0'),3) * 100), TO_NUMBER(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i-1).alt_1)),'0')))
 into v_s1
 from dual;
 select Decode ( (SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i).alt_1)),'0'),1,2)) , 'FL' ,(SUBSTR(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i).alt_1)),'0'),3) * 100), TO_NUMBER(NVL(RTRIM(LTRIM(v_legs(i).alt_1)),'0')))
 into v_s2
 from dual;
 IF v_s1 = v_s2 then 
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 1159) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||1159||' - '||get_err_text(1159);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 --End changes for SCR 4795
 
 
 
 
 
 
 -- Start mod 9
 -- Atta. 5 - 3.3
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('CF','DF','IF','TF') and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'PI' then
 -- If fix is null, error 1001 shall be cought
 if v_legs(i-1).FIX_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).FIX_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).FIX_SECTION_CODE||v_legs(i-1).FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE
 != v_legs(i).FIX_IDENT||v_legs(i).FIX_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).FIX_SECTION_CODE||v_legs(i).FIX_SUBSECTION_CODE then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 960) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||960||' - '||get_err_text(960);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6695, ARINC20:SCR 7.03 - Eswar KC - 22-May-2015
 IF v_legs(i).Route_Type = 'A' AND v_legs(i-1).Path_And_Termination = 'PI' AND v_legs(i).Path_And_Termination = 'CF' THEN
 
 IF Substr(v_legs(i-1).Magnetic_Course,4,1) = 'T' THEN
 V_Mag_Course_1 := To_Number(Substr(v_legs(i-1).Magnetic_Course,1,3));
 ELSE
 V_Mag_Course_1 := To_Number(v_legs(i-1).Magnetic_Course)/10;
 END IF;
 
 IF Substr(V_Legs(i).Magnetic_Course,4,1) = 'T' THEN
 V_Mag_Course_2 := To_Number(Substr(v_legs(i).Magnetic_Course,1,3));
 ELSE
 V_Mag_Course_2 := To_Number(V_Legs(i).Magnetic_Course)/10;
 END IF;

 V_Mag_Course_Diff := V_Mag_Course_1-V_Mag_Course_2;
 
 ls_Error := NULL;
 
 IF V_Mag_Course_Diff = 180 THEN 
 NULL;
 ELSIF v_legs(i-1).Turn_Direction = 'L' AND ( ( Sign(V_Mag_Course_Diff) = -1 AND V_Mag_Course_Diff NOT BETWEEN -180 And -90) 
 OR (Sign(V_Mag_Course_Diff) = 1 AND V_Mag_Course_Diff not Between 180 AND 270) 
 ) THEN
 ls_Error := 5669 ;
 ELSIF v_legs(i-1).Turn_Direction = 'R' AND ( (Sign(V_Mag_Course_Diff) = -1 AND V_Mag_Course_Diff NOT BETWEEN -270 AND -180 ) 
 OR (Sign(V_Mag_Course_Diff) = 1 AND V_Mag_Course_Diff not Between 90 AND 180) 
 ) THEN
 ls_Error := 5670 ;
 END IF; 
 
 IF ls_Error IS NOT NULL THEN
 -- Add the error to v_all_errors
 IF NOT is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', ls_Error) THEN
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i-1).sequence_num||' - '||
 to_char(ls_Error)||' - '||get_err_text(ls_Error)||
 ': The leg '''||v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||''' '||
 ' is followed by '''||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||''''||chr(10); 
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 -- End Fix - SCR 6695, ARINC20:SCR 7.03 - Eswar KC - 22-May-2015 
 
 
 -- Atta. 5 - 3.4.1 
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'AF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'AF' then
 if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
 != v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 961) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||961||' - '||get_err_text(961);
 end if;
 end if;
 if abs(v_legs(i-1).rho - v_legs(i).rho) > .87 then -- SCR 2555
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 962) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||962||' - '||get_err_text(962);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 -- Atta. 5 - 3.4.3
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'FD' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'AF' then
 if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
 != v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 963) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||963||' - '||get_err_text(963);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 -- Atta. 5 - 3.4.4
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('CD','VD') and v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'AF' then
 begin
 v_distance := to_number(v_legs(i-1).route_distance)/10;
 if v_distance != v_legs(i).rho then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 964) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||964||' - '||get_err_text(964);
 end if;
 end if;
 exception
 when others then -- route distance is not number.
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 964) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||964||' - '||get_err_text(964);
 end if;
 end;
 if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
 != v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 965) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||965||' - '||get_err_text(965);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if; 
 -- Atta. 5 - 3.5
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('AF','CF','DF','IF','RF','TF','HA','HF','HM') and
 v_legs(i).path_and_termination in ('FA','FC','FD','FM') then
 if v_legs(i-1).fix_ident != v_legs(i).fix_ident then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 966) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||966||' - '||get_err_text(966);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 -- Atta. 5 - 3.7
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination in ('CI','VI') and rtrim(v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT) is not null then
 if v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i-1).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION
 != v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_IDENT||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SECTION||v_legs(i).RECOMM_NAVAID_SUBSECTION then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 967) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||967||' - '||get_err_text(967);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if; 
 -- End mod 9
 -- Start SCR694 mod 4 
 begin
 if rtrim(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course) is not null and rtrim(v_legs(i).magnetic_course) is not null then
 if substr(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course,4,1) = 'T' then
 v_mag_course_1 := to_number(substr(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course,1,3));
 else
 v_mag_course_1 := to_number(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course)/10;
 end if; 
 if substr(v_legs(i).magnetic_course,4,1) = 'T' then
 v_mag_course_2 := to_number(substr(v_legs(i).magnetic_course,1,3));
 else
 v_mag_course_2 := to_number(v_legs(i).magnetic_course)/10;
 end if;
 v_mag_course_diff := abs(v_mag_course_1-v_mag_course_2);
 if v_mag_course_diff between 135 and 225 and v_mag_course_diff not in (135,225) then
 if v_legs(i).path_and_termination != 'IF' and
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination not in ('AF', 'FM', 'HM', 'PI', 'VM') and
 not(v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'RF' and v_legs(i).path_and_termination in ('RF','AF'))
 and rtrim(v_legs(i).turn_direction) is null then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 929) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||929||' - '||get_err_text(929);
 end if;
 end if;
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination not in ('AF','DF','HA','HF','HM','IF','PI','FM','VM')
 and v_legs(i).path_and_termination not in ('AF','DF','HA','HF','HM','IF','PI','RF') -- Fix - SCR 5328 - Eswar KC - 13-April-2012, added 'RF' 
 and rtrim(v_legs(i).turn_direction) != 'E' and rtrim(v_legs(i).turn_dir_valid) is null then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 930) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||930||' - '||get_err_text(930);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 /* Commented out per SCR 2666
 -- Start SCR1152 mod 5
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'RF' and 
 --(v_legs(i).path_and_termination = 'TF' or substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) in ('C','F','H')) and
 v_legs(i).path_and_termination != 'RF' and substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) != 'H' and
 v_mag_course_diff != 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 934) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||934||' - '||get_err_text(934);
 end if;
 end if; 
 */
 end if;
 /*
 if v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination = 'RF' and 
 --substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) in ('C','F','H') and
 v_legs(i).path_and_termination != 'RF' and substr(v_legs(i).path_and_termination,1,1) != 'H' and
 rtrim(v_legs(i-1).magnetic_course) is not null and rtrim(v_legs(i).magnetic_course) is null then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 934) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_legs(i).sequence_num||', '||
 v_legs(i-1).path_and_termination||'/'||v_legs(i).path_and_termination||' - '||934||' - '||get_err_text(934);
 end if;
 end if;
 -- End SCR1152 mod 5
 */
 exception
 when others then
 -- when magnetic_course is invalid, the error shall be caught at structure validation
 null;
 end; 
 -- End SCR694 mod 4 
 end loop;
 end if; 
 
 -- Check 1st and last legs
 if v_nlegs > 1 then
 if upper(p_proc) in ('SID','STAR') or
 (upper(p_proc) = 'APPROACH' and (not v_is_map or (v_is_map and v_mleg = 1))) then 
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_first_leg
 (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(2).path_and_termination,
 v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
 v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
 v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code,p_proc_type);
 if v_err > 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errors:= v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
 end if;
 end if; 
 -- Check Leg with Missed Approach
 elsif v_is_map and v_mleg != 1 then
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_first_leg
 (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, null,
 v_legs(v_mleg-1).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
 v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc, FALSE,
 v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_mleg-1).waypoint_desc_code,p_proc_type);
 if v_err > 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
 end if;
 end if;
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_last_leg
 (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, null,
 v_legs(v_mleg-1).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
 v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,FALSE,
 v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_mleg-1).waypoint_desc_code);
 if v_err > 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err)||' - The Map '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10); 
 end if;
 end if; 
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_first_leg
 (v_legs(v_mleg).path_and_termination, null,
 v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
 v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc, v_is_map,
 v_legs(v_mleg).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code,p_proc_type);
 if v_err > 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
 end if;
 end if;
 end if;
 else
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_first_leg
 (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(1).path_and_termination,
 v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
 v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
 v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code,p_proc_type);
 if v_err > 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err)||' - Single Leg, '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10); 
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 if v_nlegs > 1 then
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_last_leg
 (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(2).path_and_termination,
 v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
 v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
 v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code);
 if v_err > 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10); 
 end if;
 end if; 
 else
 v_err := chkprc_util.v_last_leg
 (v_legs(1).path_and_termination, v_legs(1).path_and_termination,
 v_legs(v_nlegs).path_and_termination, v_segs(i).route_type,
 v_segs(i).transition_ident, v_nlegs, p_proc,v_is_map,
 v_legs(1).waypoint_desc_code, v_legs(v_nlegs).waypoint_desc_code);
 if v_err > 0 then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'-> '||to_char(v_err)||' - Single Leg, '||get_err_text(v_err)||chr(10);
 end if;
 end if; 
 end if;
 -- Check the existence of all fields
 chkprc_util.v_fields_exist('APPROACH', v_legs, v_nlegs, v_errlist);
 if v_errlist.count > 0 then
 for i in 1..v_errlist.count loop
 v_err_num := to_number(substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),1,4));
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err_num) then
 v_seq := v_legs(to_number(substr(to_char(v_errlist(i)),5))).SEQUENCE_NUM;
 v_all_errors := v_all_errors||'-> Seq#'||v_seq||' - '||
 to_char(v_err_num)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_num)||chr(10); 
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;
 --
 if v_all_errors is not null then
 if v_segs(i).route_type != 'A' and v_segs(i).transition_ident = '-' then
 ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||chr(10)||'* Approach Common: '||chr(10)||v_all_errors;
 else 
 ls_Proc_Err := ls_Proc_Err||chr(10)||'* Route Type '''||v_segs(i).route_type||''', Transition '''||
 v_segs(i).transition_ident||''': '||chr(10)||v_all_errors;
 end if; 
 end if;
 v_all_errors := null;
 -- End check one segment
 end loop;
 -- Continue mod for SCR 695
 if v_exist_route = 'ANN' then
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', 776) then
 ls_Proc_Err := '* 776 - '||get_err_text(776)||chr(10)||ls_Proc_Err; 
 end if;
 end if;

--Begin SCR 6443.02 --Madhu
 
 IF ls_Primary_MAP>1 THEN
 IF NOT is_override(:global.data_supplier,v_processing_cycle,'APPROACH',5673) THEN
 ls_Proc_Err := '*5673 - '||get_err_text(5673)||chr(10)||ls_Proc_err;
 END IF;
 END IF;
--End SCR 6443.02 -- Madhu 
--65347
 v_transition_aircraft_type := replace(v_transition_aircraft_type, ',', null);
 v_invalid_aircraft_type := chkprc_util.check_aircraft_type_comb(v_transition_aircraft_type, v_common_aircraft_type,v_invalid_values); --SCR 6146
 
 IF v_invalid_aircraft_type = 'Y' THEN
 IF NOT UTIL1.IS_OVERRIDE_ERROR(:global.data_supplier,v_processing_cycle,'APPROACH', 5680) THEN
 ls_Proc_Err := '*5680 - '||get_err_text(5680)||chr(10)||ls_Proc_err;
 END IF;
 END IF;
--65347
 --Begin fix SCR 5990 --Madhu --27-Sep-2013
 IF LENGTH(ls_Proc_Err) < 20000 THEN
 p_error_list := ls_Proc_Err;
 ELSIF LENGTH(ls_Proc_Err) >= 20000 THEN
 p_error_list := SUBSTR(ls_Proc_Err,1,20000);
 END IF;
 --End fix SCR 5990 --Madhu --27-Sep-2013
 -- End checking one procedure
 exception
 when v_exception then
 p_error_list := ls_Proc_Err;--Fix SCR 6909--Madhu--28-Jun-2016
 --null;
 when others then 
 dsp_msg(sqlerrm); 
 end v_one_proc;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_MESSAGE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE set_message(p_show varchar2) IS
BEGIN
 if p_show = 'Y' then
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 end if;
 else
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 :control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
 set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 else
 :control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS := null;
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 end if;
 synchronize;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_SEGMENT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*
 SCR 0126 --Madhu -- 15-Apr-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form from 229A to 236 Builds(SCR no's 3476,5359,5332,5294)
 
*/
/*
 SCR 0155 --Madhu -- 25-June-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form for the 238 Build(SCR no's 5549)
 
*/
PROCEDURE validate_segment (p_ignore_ref VARCHAR2 := 'Y')
IS
 v_all_err VARCHAR2 (32000) := NULL;
 --Increased the length from 1000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
 v_in_house VARCHAR2 (1);
 v_errlist cpt_types.errlist_type;
 rseg check_procedures.segrec1; -- sesha today
 v_cycle NUMBER (7);
 v_std_seg pl_std_approach_segment%ROWTYPE;
 v_tld_seg pl_tld_approach_segment%ROWTYPE;
 v_err VARCHAR2 (5);
 v_dcr NUMBER;
 -- start Fix -- SCR 5294-- U Neelima -- 10/Feb/2012
 v_record sdv_records.cr_path_point;
 v_err_list cpt_types.errlist_type;
 v_err_ind NUMBER := 0;
 v_pathpoint VARCHAR2 (1);
 v_srec pl_std_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE;
 v_trec pl_tld_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE;
 v_nerr VARCHAR2 (2);
 v_valid VARCHAR2 (1) := NULL;
 v_ignore_ref VARCHAR2 (1) := 'Y';
 v_count NUMBER;
 v_s_count NUMBER;
 v_t_count NUMBER;
 v_table_type VARCHAR2 (5);
 v_dcr_number NUMBER;
 ln_err NUMBER;
-- End Fix -- SCR 5294-- U Neelima -- 10/Feb/2012
BEGIN

 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'BUSY');
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S'
 THEN
 v_in_house := 'N';
 v_cycle := :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle;
 rseg.record_type := 'S';
 rseg.terminal_type := 'A';
 rseg.route_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type;
 rseg.transition_ident := :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident;
 rseg.procedure_ident := :pl_std_approach.approach_ident;
 rseg.terminal_ident := :pl_std_approach.airport_ident;
 rseg.terminal_icao := :pl_std_approach.airport_icao;
 rseg.cust_area_code := NULL;
 rseg.apch_route_qualifier_1 :=
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1, ' ');
 rseg.apch_route_qualifier_2 :=
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2, ' ');
 --
 v_std_seg.data_supplier := :GLOBAL.data_supplier;
 v_std_seg.processing_cycle := :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle;
 v_std_seg.approach_ident := :pl_std_approach.approach_ident;
 v_std_seg.airport_ident := :pl_std_approach.airport_ident;
 v_std_seg.airport_icao := :pl_std_approach.airport_icao;
 v_std_seg.route_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type;
 v_std_seg.aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 v_std_seg.apch_route_qualifier_1 :=
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1, ' ');

 --
 IF p_ignore_ref = 'N'
 THEN
 set_update_dcr ('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT', NULL);
 END IF;

 v_dcr := :pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number;
 ELSE
 v_in_house := :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag;
 v_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle;
 rseg.record_type := 'T';
 rseg.terminal_type := 'A';
 rseg.route_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type;
 rseg.aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --65347
 rseg.transition_ident := :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident;
 rseg.procedure_ident := :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident;
 rseg.terminal_ident := :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident;
 rseg.terminal_icao := :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao;
 rseg.cust_area_code := :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident;
 rseg.apch_route_qualifier_1 :=
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1, ' ');
 rseg.apch_route_qualifier_2 :=
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2, ' ');
 --
 v_tld_seg.data_supplier := :GLOBAL.data_supplier;
 v_tld_seg.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle;
 v_tld_seg.customer_ident := :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident;
 v_tld_seg.approach_ident := :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident;
 v_tld_seg.airport_ident := :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident;
 v_tld_seg.airport_icao := :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao;
 v_tld_seg.generated_in_house_flag :=
 :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag;
 v_tld_seg.route_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type;
 v_tld_seg.apch_route_qualifier_1 :=
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1, ' ');

 --
 IF p_ignore_ref = 'N'
 THEN
 set_update_dcr ('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT', NULL);
 END IF;

 v_dcr := :pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number;
 END IF;
-- Fix Start SCR 7426 --12-SEP-2017 --Ashish N 
/* IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' THEN 
 IF :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type IS NULL THEN
 NULL;
 ELSIF :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type IS NOT NULL AND :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type NOT IN ('A','B','C','D','E','F','G','H','I','J','K','L','P','R','S','T','U' ) Then 
 IF NOT is_override (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,
 'APPROACH',
 1181
 ) THEN
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||'1181'||' - ' || 'Route Type: '||:PL_STD_approach_SEGMENT.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:PL_STD_approach_SEGMENT.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Aircraft Type: '||get_err_text(1181)||chr(10);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 IF :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type IS NULL THEN
 NULL;
 ELSIF :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type IS NOT NULL AND :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type NOT IN ('A','B','C','D','E','F','G','H','I','J','K','L','P','R','S','T','U' ) Then 
 IF NOT is_override (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,
 'APPROACH',
 1181
 ) THEN 
 v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||'1181'||' - ' || 'Route Type: '||:pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type||' Transition Ident: '||:pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident||'-->' ||'Aircraft Type: '||get_err_text(1181)||chr(10);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
-- Fix End SCR 7426 --12-SEP-2017 --Ashish N 
 */
 v_errlist :=
 chkprc_util.check_approach (rseg,
 :GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,
 'AIRPORT',
 v_in_house,
 0,
 'APPROACH_SEGMENT',
 p_ignore_ref,'DU'--7607
 );

 IF v_errlist.COUNT > 0
 THEN
 FOR i IN 1 .. v_errlist.COUNT
 LOOP
 /* Commented as part of the - Begin Fix - SCR 6617.08, ARINC20:SCR 8.05 - Eswar KC - 08-May-2015 
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 5549 - Eswar KC - June - 04 - 2012; Here Excluding the validation for the QUALIFIER_1 'F' for TLD Approach only. 
 IF :PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.APCH_ROUTE_QUALIFIER_1 in('A','B','F') AND v_errlist (i) = 412 THEN 
 NULL;
 ElsIF :PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.APCH_ROUTE_QUALIFIER_2 in ('L','V') AND v_errlist (i) = 415 THEN
 NULL;
 Else 
 -- End Fix - SCR 5549 - Eswar KC - June - 04 - 2012 
 */ -- End Fix - SCR 6617.08, ARINC20:SCR 8.05 - Eswar KC - 08-May-2015
 IF NOT is_override (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,
 'APPROACH',
 v_errlist (i)
 )
 THEN
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err
 || ' * '
 || v_errlist (i)
 || ' - '
 || get_err_text (v_errlist (i))
 || CHR (10);
 END IF;
 -- END IF; -- Fix - SCR 5549 - Eswar KC - June - 04 - 2012; -- Fix Commented - SCR 6617.08, ARINC20:SCR 8.05 - Eswar KC - 08-May-2015 
 END LOOP;
 END IF;

 --
 IF rseg.route_type = 'R' AND rseg.apch_route_qualifier_1 = 'W'
 THEN
 recrv2.vapproach_path (:parameter.record_type,
 v_std_seg,
 v_tld_seg,
 v_dcr,
 v_err,
 p_ignore_ref
 );

 -- start Fix -- SCR 5294-- U Neelima -- 09/Feb/2012
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S'
 THEN
 SELECT COUNT (*)
 INTO v_count
 FROM pl_std_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = v_std_seg.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = v_cycle
 AND airport_ident = :pl_std_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = :pl_std_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = :pl_std_approach.approach_ident
 AND validate_ind = 'I';

 IF v_err = 'N' AND v_count > 0
 THEN
 populate_path_point_record (rseg.terminal_ident,
 rseg.terminal_icao,
 rseg.procedure_ident,
 NULL,
 v_cycle,
 'S',
 v_record
 );
 recsv1.vpath_point (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,
 v_record,
 v_err_list,
 v_err_ind,
 v_pathpoint,
 v_in_house
 );

 IF v_err_ind = 0
 THEN
 populate_path_point_rel_record
 (:pl_std_approach.airport_ident,
 :pl_std_approach.airport_icao,
 :pl_std_approach.approach_ident,
 NULL,
 v_cycle,
 'S',
 v_srec,
 v_trec
 );
 recrv1.vpath_point (:parameter.record_type,
 v_srec,
 v_trec,
 v_nerr,
 v_valid,
 v_ignore_ref
 );

 IF v_nerr = 'NN'
 THEN -- Error due to 3016 and 203
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err
 || ' * 3018 - '
 || get_err_text (3018)
 || CHR (10);
 ELSIF v_nerr = 'NY'
 THEN -- Error only due to 3016
 UPDATE pl_std_airport_path_point
 SET validate_ind = 'Y'
 WHERE data_supplier = v_std_seg.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = v_cycle
 AND airport_ident = :pl_std_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = :pl_std_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = :pl_std_approach.approach_ident;

 COMMIT_FORM;
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := 'Y';

 SELECT create_dcr_number
 INTO v_dcr_number
 FROM pl_std_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = v_std_seg.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = v_cycle
 AND airport_ident = :pl_std_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = :pl_std_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = :pl_std_approach.approach_ident;

 refresh_master_library.refresh_a_record
 (v_table_type,
 v_dcr_number,
 v_cycle,
 'STD_AIRPORT_PATH_POINT',
 'Y'
 );
 END IF;
 ELSIF v_err_ind != 0
 THEN
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err || ' * 3018 - ' || get_err_text (3018)
 || CHR (10);
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := 'N';
 END IF;
 ELSIF v_err = 'N' AND v_count = 0
 THEN
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err || ' * 3018 - ' || get_err_text (3018)
 || CHR (10);
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := 'N';
 END IF;
 END IF; -- End of :parameter.record_type = 'S'

 IF :parameter.record_type = 'T'
 THEN
 SELECT COUNT (*)
 INTO v_t_count
 FROM pl_tld_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = v_tld_seg.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = v_cycle
 AND customer_ident = :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident
 AND airport_ident = :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident
 AND validate_ind = 'I';

 SELECT COUNT (*)
 INTO v_s_count
 FROM pl_std_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = v_tld_seg.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = v_cycle
 AND airport_ident = :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident
 AND validate_ind = 'I';

 IF v_err = 'N' AND v_t_count > 0
 THEN
 populate_path_point_record (rseg.terminal_ident,
 rseg.terminal_icao,
 rseg.procedure_ident,
 rseg.cust_area_code,
 v_cycle,
 'T',
 v_record
 );
 recsv1.vpath_point (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,
 v_record,
 v_err_list,
 v_err_ind,
 v_pathpoint,
 v_in_house
 );

 IF v_err_ind = 0
 THEN
 populate_path_point_rel_record
 (:pl_tld_approach.airport_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao,
 :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident,
 rseg.cust_area_code,
 v_cycle,
 'T',
 v_srec,
 v_trec
 );
 recrv1.vpath_point (:parameter.record_type,
 v_srec,
 v_trec,
 v_nerr,
 v_valid,
 v_ignore_ref
 );

 IF v_nerr = 'NN'
 THEN -- Error due to 3016 and 203
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err
 || ' * 3018 - '
 || get_err_text (3018)
 || CHR (10);
 ELSIF v_nerr = 'NY'
 THEN -- Error only due to 3016
 UPDATE pl_tld_airport_path_point
 SET validate_ind = 'Y'
 WHERE data_supplier = v_tld_seg.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = v_cycle
 AND customer_ident = rseg.cust_area_code
 AND airport_ident = :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident;

 COMMIT_FORM;
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'Y';

 SELECT create_dcr_number
 INTO v_dcr_number
 FROM pl_tld_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = v_tld_seg.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = v_cycle
 AND customer_ident = rseg.cust_area_code
 AND airport_ident = :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident;

 refresh_master_library.refresh_a_record
 (v_table_type,
 v_dcr_number,
 v_cycle,
 'TLD_AIRPORT_PATH_POINT',
 'Y'
 );
 END IF;
 ELSIF v_err_ind != 0
 THEN
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err || ' * 3018 - ' || get_err_text (3018)
 || CHR (10);
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'N';
 END IF;
 ELSIF v_err = 'N' AND v_s_count > 0
 THEN
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err || ' * 3018 - ' || get_err_text (3018)
 || CHR (10);
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'N';
 ELSIF v_err = 'N' AND v_t_count = 0 AND v_s_count = 0
 THEN
 v_all_err :=
 v_all_err || ' * 3018 - ' || get_err_text (3018)
 || CHR (10);
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'N';
 END IF;
 END IF; -- End of :parameter.record_type = 'T'
-- End Fix -- SCR 5294-- U Neelima -- 10/Feb/2012
 END IF;
 -- end of rseg.route_type = 'R' and rseg.apch_route_qualifier_1 = 'W'

 --
 IF v_all_err IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S'
 THEN
 :control_block.std_validation_errors :=
 v_all_err
 || :pl_std_approach.ref_info;
 ELSE
 :control_block.tld_validation_errors :=
 v_all_err
 || :pl_tld_approach.ref_info;
 END IF;

 :control_block.temp_errors := v_all_err || CHR (10);
 set_message ('Y');
 ELSE
 :control_block.temp_errors := NULL;
 END IF;

 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_VALIDATE_IND
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION Set_validate_ind
 (p_o_ind varchar2, p_n_ind varchar2) return varchar2 IS
BEGIN
 if p_o_ind = 'N' then
 return substr(p_n_ind,1,1)||'N----';
 elsif p_o_ind = 'W' then
 return substr(p_n_ind,1,2)||'W---';
 elsif p_o_ind = 'H' then
 return substr(p_n_ind,1,3)||'H--';
 elsif p_o_ind = 'S' then
