 return substr(p_n_ind,1,4)||'S-';
 elsif p_o_ind = 'Y' then
 return substr(p_n_ind,1,5)||'Y'; 
 --elsif p_o_ind = 'I' then
 -- return 'I-----';
 else
 return p_n_ind;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: UPDATE_PROC_TYPE_AND_ALTITUDE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Update_Proc_Type_And_Altitude (p_master in varchar2,p_terminal in varchar2) is
 v_cust varchar2(3) := null;
 v_max_altitude number(5);
 v_type varchar2(1);
 v_terminal varchar2(8);
BEGIN
 if :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
 v_cust := name_in(p_master||'.customer_ident');
 end if;
 if p_terminal = 'A' then
 v_terminal := 'airport';
 else
 v_terminal := 'heliport';
 end if;
 go_block(p_master||'_SEGMENT');
 first_record;
 if name_in(p_master||'_segment.route_type') is not null then
 loop
 v_max_altitude := check_procedures.set_max_trans_altitude
 (:parameter.record_type,substr(p_master,8),p_terminal,
 name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_ident'),
 name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_icao'),
 name_in(p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_ident'),
 name_in(p_master||'_segment.route_type'),
 name_in(p_master||'_segment.transition_ident'),
 v_cust,
 name_in(p_master||'_segment.create_dcr_number'),
 :global.data_supplier,
 name_in(p_master||'.processing_cycle'),
 name_in(p_master||'_segment.aircraft_type')); --65347
 if nvl(v_max_altitude,-1) != nvl(name_in(p_master||'_segment.max_trans_altitude'),-1) then
 copy(v_max_altitude,:system.cursor_block||'.max_trans_altitude');
 end if;
 if :system.last_record = 'TRUE' then
 first_record;
 exit;
 else
 next_record;
 end if;
 end loop;
 end if;
 v_type := check_procedures.set_procedure_type
 (:parameter.record_type,substr(p_master,8),p_terminal,
 name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_ident'),
 name_in(p_master||'.'||v_terminal||'_icao'),
 name_in(p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_ident'),
 v_cust,
 name_in(p_master||'_segment.create_dcr_number'),
 :global.data_supplier,
 name_in(p_master||'.processing_cycle')); 
 if v_type != nvl(name_in(p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_type'),'A') then
 copy(v_type,p_master||'.'||substr(p_master,8)||'_type');
 end if; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PROC_PK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION check_proc_pk RETURN boolean IS
 v_exist number := 0;
BEGIN
 if upper(:parameter.record_type) = 'S' then
 select count(*) 
 into v_exist
 from pl_std_approach
 where airport_ident = :pl_std_approach.airport_ident
 and airport_icao = :pl_std_approach.airport_icao
 and approach_ident = :pl_std_approach.approach_ident
 and processing_cycle = :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle
 and data_supplier = :pl_std_approach.data_supplier
 and create_dcr_number != nvl(:pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number,0);
 else
 select count(*) 
 into v_exist
 from pl_tld_approach
 where airport_ident = :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident
 and airport_icao = :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao
 and approach_ident = :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident
 and customer_ident = :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident
 and processing_cycle = :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle
 and data_supplier = :pl_tld_approach.data_supplier
 and create_dcr_number != nvl(:pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number,0);
 end if;
 if v_exist > 0 then
 return FALSE;
 end if;
 return TRUE;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_SEGMENT_PK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION Check_segment_pk RETURN boolean IS
 v_exist number := 0;
BEGIN
 if upper(:parameter.record_type) = 'S' then
 select count(*) 
 into v_exist
 from pl_std_approach_segment
 where route_type = :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type
 and transition_ident = :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident
 and aircraft_type = :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type --65347
 and airport_ident = :pl_std_approach_segment.airport_ident
 and airport_icao = :pl_std_approach_segment.airport_icao
 and approach_ident = :pl_std_approach_segment.approach_ident
 and processing_cycle = :pl_std_approach_segment.processing_cycle
 and data_supplier = :pl_std_approach_segment.data_supplier
 and create_dcr_number != nvl(:pl_std_approach_segment.create_dcr_number,0);
 else
 select count(*) 
 into v_exist
 from pl_tld_approach_segment
 where route_type = :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type
 and transition_ident = :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident
 and aircraft_type = :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type --65347
 and airport_ident = :pl_tld_approach_segment.airport_ident
 and airport_icao = :pl_tld_approach_segment.airport_icao
 and approach_ident = :pl_tld_approach_segment.approach_ident
 and customer_ident = :pl_tld_approach_segment.customer_ident
 and processing_cycle = :pl_tld_approach_segment.processing_cycle
 and data_supplier = :pl_tld_approach_segment.data_supplier
 and create_dcr_number != nvl(:pl_tld_approach_segment.create_dcr_number,0);
 end if;
 if v_exist > 0 then
 return FALSE;
 end if;
 return TRUE;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_WAYPOINT_CODE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE set_waypoint_code IS
 v_waypoint_code varchar2(4);
BEGIN
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 v_waypoint_code := rtrim(nvl(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc1,' ')||
 nvl(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc2,' ')||
 nvl(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc3,' ')||
 nvl(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.wc4,' '));
 if nvl(v_waypoint_code,' ') != nvl(:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE,' ') then
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE := v_waypoint_code;
 end if;
 else
 v_waypoint_code := rtrim(nvl(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc1,' ')||
 nvl(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc2,' ')||
 nvl(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc3,' ')||
 nvl(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.wc4,' '));
 if nvl(v_waypoint_code,' ') != nvl(:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE,' ') then
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE := v_waypoint_code;
 end if;
 end if; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_TO_COMMIT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE check_to_commit (p_action_type VARCHAR2)
IS
 v_master VARCHAR2 (30) := SUBSTR (:SYSTEM.cursor_block, 1, 15);
 v_button NUMBER (1) := 1;
 total_rows NUMBER;
 cursor_block VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
 cursor_record VARCHAR2 (4) := :SYSTEM.cursor_record;
 cursor_item VARCHAR2 (100) := :SYSTEM.cursor_item;
 v_temp VARCHAR2 (32000); --Increased the length from 8000 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
 v_button_text VARCHAR2 (100);
 msgnum NUMBER := MESSAGE_CODE; -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011
 ls_Table VARCHAR2(50) ; -- Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021
 ln_cnt NUMBER; -- Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021
 
BEGIN
 IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
 ls_Table := Get_Block_Property( SUBSTR (:SYSTEM.cursor_block, 1, 15), QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME); -- Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021
 set_waypoint_code;
 IF :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED' OR ( :control_block.validated = 'N' AND
 NAME_IN ( 'control_block.'|| SUBSTR (:SYSTEM.cursor_block, 4, 3)|| '_VALIDATION_ERRORS') IS NOT NULL ) THEN
 
 IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
 v_button_text := 'Cancel';
 call_trans_ident_chk; -- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012. 
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
 v_button_text := 'Exit Without Save';
 ELSIF p_action_type NOT IN ('ENTER_QUERY', 'EXECUTE_QUERY') THEN
 v_button_text := 'Clear Without Save';
 ELSE
 v_button_text := 'Cancel Modification';
 END IF;

 IF :GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' THEN
 v_button := display_alert.more_buttons('S','Refresh Record','Record is modified or inserted or deleted. Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| 
 --'1. Save without refreshing the Master Library'||chr(10)|| -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011
 '1. Save and refresh Master Library'|| CHR (10)|| 
 '2. Cancel modification, NO Save, NO Refresh',
 'Save&Refresh', v_button_text );
 ELSE
 IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
 v_button := 1;
 --Begin Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.form_status <> 'CHANGED' and p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
 v_button := 2;
 --End Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
 ELSE
 v_button := display_alert.more_buttons
 ('S','Refresh Record','Record is modified or inserted or deleted. Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| ' ',
 'Save',v_button_text
 );
 END IF;
 --Begin Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
 IF v_button = 1 THEN
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 COMMIT_FORM;
 ELSE
 EXIT_FORM (no_commit); 
 END IF;
 --End Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
 END IF;
 
 
 -- Here the v_button values are chnaged 2 in place of 3, 1 in place of 2 for SCR 5180 - Eswar KC
 IF (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' AND v_button = 2) OR (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed != 'Y' AND v_button = 1) 
 OR (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed != 'Y' AND v_button = 2) OR v_button = 3 THEN --Fix - SCR 5814 - Madhu - 14-Nov-2012.
 IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
 call_trans_ident_chk; -- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
 NULL;
 ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
 EXIT_FORM (no_commit);
 ELSE
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
 GO_BLOCK (v_master || '_LEG');
 CLEAR_BLOCK (no_commit);
 GO_BLOCK (v_master || '_SEGMENT');
 CLEAR_BLOCK (no_commit);
 GO_BLOCK (v_master);
 CLEAR_RECORD;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 -- Validate Procedure
 IF RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.airport_ident')) IS NOT NULL THEN
 validate_procedure ('N');
 call_trans_ident_chk;-- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 commit_form;
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 5747 - Madhu - 2-Nov-2012. 
 --v_err:= validate_appnomap_samap; -- Fix - SCR 5751.03 - Eswar KC - 20-Mar-2013
 --v_temp := v_err; -- Fix - SCR 5751.03 - Eswar KC - 20-Mar-2013
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
 v_temp := v_temp||:control_block.tld_validation_errors; 
 ELSE
 v_temp := v_temp||:control_block.std_validation_errors; 
 END IF;
 -- Begin Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021 
 forms_utilities.check_valid_ind_const_prc(substr(ls_Table,4),
 RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.create_dcr_number')),
 :GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.processing_cycle')),
 ln_cnt
 );
 --dsp_msg('count:'||ln_cnt);
 IF ln_cnt > 0 THEN
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH.VALIDATE_IND := 'I';
 ELSE
 :PL_STD_APPROACH.VALIDATE_IND := 'I';
 END IF;
 v_temp := v_temp||'- There exists an inconsistency in validate indicator of Approach and Approach Leg. Please re-query the record to get proper error details.';
 refresh_master_library.set_record_group
 (RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.create_dcr_number')),RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.validate_ind')) ,
 ls_Table,RTRIM (NAME_IN (v_master || '.processing_cycle')),'U');
 commit_form;
 END IF;
 --End Fix SCR 6460--Madhu - 9-Jun-2021
 -- End Fix - SCR 5747 - Madhu - 2-Nov-2012.
 --call_trans_ident_chk;
 -- IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
 -- v_temp := :control_block.tld_validation_errors;
 -- ELSE
 -- v_temp := :control_block.std_validation_errors;
 -- END IF;
 --call_trans_ident_chk; 
 -- :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 -- COMMIT_FORM;
 update_proc_type_and_altitude (v_master, 'A');
 GO_BLOCK (cursor_block);
 IF cursor_block NOT LIKE '%APPROACH' THEN
 GO_RECORD (cursor_record);
 END IF;
 GO_ITEM (cursor_item);
 END IF;
 IF :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED' THEN
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'SAVE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Madhu - 16-Sep-2012 
 call_trans_ident_chk; -- Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.
 COMMIT_FORM;
 END IF;
 IF p_action_type IN ('DOWN', 'NEXT_RECORD') THEN
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END IF;
 -- Set Refreshing
 IF :GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' THEN
 total_rows := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT (FIND_GROUP ('Refresh_Records_Group'));

 -- Below removed the logic for the button 'Save Only' as per needed. - Fix - Eswar KC - SCR 5180.
 IF total_rows > 0 THEN
 IF v_button = 1 THEN
 refresh_master_library.refresh_records (total_rows);
 IF (msgnum = 40400) THEN -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011
 CLEAR_MESSAGE;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 :control_block.validated := 'Y';

 IF v_temp IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' THEN
 :control_block.std_validation_errors := v_temp;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.std_validation_errors', visible, property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.std_validation_errors', enabled, property_true );
 ELSE
 :control_block.tld_validation_errors := v_temp;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.tld_validation_errors', visible, property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('control_block.tld_validation_errors', enabled, property_true );
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 --
 ELSE
 refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
 END IF;
 END IF;
--if :system.cursor_block like 'PL%APPROACH' and name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.create_dcr_number') is not null then
-- INVALID_RECORD_COUNT(NULL,NULL,NULL,'MASTER');
--end if;
--Start SCR 64476 -Ashish N- 08-May-2019
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN 
 go_item('pl_tld_approach.customer_ident');
 ELSE
 go_item('pl_std_approach.airport_ident');
 END IF;
--End SCR 64476 -Ashish N- 08-May-2019
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_KEYS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE validate_keys(p_ignore_ref varchar2 := 'Y') IS
v_dcr number := null;
v_err number;
v_err_PAI number := 0;
v_all_errs varchar2(32000) := null;--Increased the length from 200 to 32000 ,SCR 5021,By Neelima, 07-Mar-2011
v_cycle number(7);
v_processing_cycle number(7);
BEGIN
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'BUSY');
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 if rtrim(:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle) is null then
 :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
 end if; 
 v_processing_cycle := :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle;
 if :global.recent_cycle >= v_processing_cycle then
 v_cycle := v_processing_cycle;
 else
 v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
 end if;
 -- Check Area Code 

 v_err := util1.v_area_code(:pl_std_approach.area_code);
 -- Check Airport

 v_dcr := vrel2.check_reference(p_ignore_ref, 'pl_std_approach',
 :pl_std_approach.create_dcr_number,
 'S','P','A',
 :global.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,--:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle,
 :pl_std_approach.airport_icao,
 :pl_std_approach.airport_ident);
 
 if :pl_std_approach.primary_approach_ind is not null and
 :pl_std_approach.primary_approach_ind not in (' ','P') then
 v_err_PAI := 5661;
 end if;
 if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
 set_update_dcr('PL_STD_APPROACH',null);
 end if; 
 else
 validate_extra_fields(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle,:PL_TLD_APPROACH.generated_in_house_flag);
 if rtrim(:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle) is null then
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
 end if;
 v_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle;
 /* if :global.recent_cycle >= v_processing_cycle then
 v_cycle := v_processing_cycle;
 else
 v_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
 end if;*/ --7607
 v_cycle := :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle; --7607
 if rtrim(:pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag) is null then
 :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag := 'Y';
 end if;
 -- Check Customer Ident
 v_err := util1.v_customer(:pl_tld_approach.customer_ident); 
 -- Check Airport
 v_dcr := vrel2.check_reference(p_ignore_ref,'pl_tld_approach',
 :pl_tld_approach.create_dcr_number,
 'T','P','A',
 :global.data_supplier,
 v_cycle,--:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle,
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao,
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident,
 null,null,
 :pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag,
 null,'DU');--7607 added null and DU
 if :pl_tld_approach.primary_approach_ind is not null and
 :pl_tld_approach.primary_approach_ind not in (' ','P') then
 v_err_PAI := 5661;
 end if;
 if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
 set_update_dcr('PL_TLD_APPROACH',null);
 end if; 
 end if;
 if v_err > 0 or v_dcr is null or v_err_PAI > 0 then
 if v_err > 0 then 
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err) then
 v_all_errs := '* '||to_char(v_err)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err);
 end if; 
 end if;
 if v_dcr is null then
 v_all_errs := v_all_errs||' * 216 - '||get_err_text(216);
 end if;
 if v_err_PAI > 0 then 
 if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, v_processing_cycle, 'APPROACH', v_err_PAI) then
 v_all_errs := v_all_errs||' * '||to_char(v_err_PAI)||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_PAI);
 end if; 
 end if;
 end if;
 if v_all_errs is not null then
 :control_block.temp_errors := v_all_errs||chr(10);
 set_message('Y');
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 :control_block.std_VALIDATION_ERRORS := v_all_errs||:PL_STD_APPROACH.ref_info;
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH.ref_info is null then
 if nvl(:pl_std_approach.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
 :pl_std_approach.validate_ind := 'I';
 :pl_std_approach.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1; 
 end if;
 else
 set_item_property('control_block.STD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.STD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
 --raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;
 else
 :control_block.tld_VALIDATION_ERRORS := v_all_errs||:pl_tld_approach.ref_info;
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH.ref_info is null then
 if nvl(:pl_tld_approach.validate_ind,'Y') in ('Y','S','H','W','N','O') then
 :pl_tld_approach.validate_ind := 'I';
 :pl_tld_approach.old_validate_ind := 'I';
 :control_block.count_invalid := :control_block.count_invalid + 1;
 end if;
 else
 set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
 --raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if; 
 else
 :control_block.temp_errors := null; 
 set_message('N');
 end if;
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POPULATE_RECORD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE populate_record
 (p_record out sdv_records.cr_airport_procedure,
 p_cycle out number,
 p_processing_cycle out number) IS 
BEGIN
 -- Populate v_record;
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 p_processing_cycle := nvl(rtrim(:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle),:global.processing_cycle);
 if :global.recent_cycle >= nvl(rtrim(p_processing_cycle),0) then
 p_cycle := p_processing_cycle;
 else
 p_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
 end if;
 p_record.procedure_type := 'F'; -- This is a APPROACH
 p_record.record_type := :parameter.record_type;
 p_record.section := 'P'; -- This is an airport
 p_record.airport_icao := :pl_std_approach.airport_icao;
 p_record.airport_ident := :pl_std_approach.airport_ident;
 p_record.gps_fms_ind := nvl(:pl_std_approach.gps_fms_ind,' ');
 p_record.primary_approach_ind := ' '; -- Validation for this field is done on Validate-Keys
 p_record.alt_1 := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.alt_1,' ');
 p_record.alt_2 := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.alt_2,' ');
 p_record.alt_description := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.alt_description,' ');
 p_record.arc_radius := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_approach_leg.arc_radius*1000),6,'0');
 p_record.atc_ind := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.atc_ind,' ');
 p_record.center_fix_icao_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
 p_record.center_fix_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_ident;
 p_record.center_fix_multiple_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
 p_record.center_fix_section := :pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_section;
 p_record.center_fix_subsection := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ');
 p_record.cycle_data := :pl_std_approach_leg.cycle_data;
 p_record.file_recno := :pl_std_approach_leg.file_recno;
 p_record.fix_icao_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_icao_code;
 p_record.fix_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_ident;
 p_record.fix_section_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.fix_section_code;
 p_record.fix_subsection_code := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ');
 p_record.magnetic_course := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4);
 p_record.path_and_termination := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.path_and_termination,' ');
 p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
 p_record.recomm_navaid_ident := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
 p_record.recomm_navaid_section := :pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
 p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ');
 p_record.rho := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_approach_leg.rho*10),4,'0');
 p_record.rnp := :pl_std_approach_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 --p_record.rnp2 := :pl_std_approach_leg.rnp2;
 --p_record.rnp3 := :pl_std_approach_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 p_record.route_distance := :pl_std_approach_leg.route_distance;
 p_record.route_type := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.route_type,' ');
 p_record.sequence_num := lpad(:pl_std_approach_leg.sequence_num,3,'0');
 p_record.procedure_ident := rpad(:pl_std_approach.approach_ident,6,' ');
 p_record.speed_limit := lpad(:pl_std_approach_leg.speed_limit,3,'0');
 p_record.theta := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_approach_leg.theta*10),4,'0');
 p_record.trans_altitude := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_approach_leg.trans_altitude),5,'0');
 p_record.transition_ident := rpad(:pl_std_approach_leg.transition_ident,5,' ');
 p_record.turn_dir_valid := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ');
 p_record.turn_direction := nvl(:pl_std_approach_leg.turn_direction,' ');
 if :pl_std_approach_leg.vertical_angle < 0 then
 p_record.vertical_angle := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(:pl_std_approach_leg.vertical_angle*100),2),3,'0');
 else
 p_record.vertical_angle := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_approach_leg.vertical_angle*100),4,'0');
 end if;
 p_record.waypoint_desc_code := nvl(rpad(:pl_std_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4,' '),' ');
 p_record.area_code := :pl_std_approach.area_code;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013
 p_record.fas_ind := nvl(:pl_std_approach.fas_ind,'');
 p_record.fas_name := nvl(:pl_std_approach.fas_name,'');
 p_record.lnav_vnav_ind := nvl(:pl_std_approach.lnav_vnav_ind,'');
 p_record.lnav_vnav_name := nvl(:pl_std_approach.lnav_vnav_name,'');
 p_record.lnav_ind := nvl(:pl_std_approach.lnav_ind,'');
 p_record.lnav_name := nvl(:pl_std_approach.lnav_name,'');
-- End Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013
-- Begin Fix - SCR 6709 -- Madhu - 15-Mar-2016
 -- p_record.aircraft_type := :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type; --Fix scr 7426 
 p_record.specials_ind := :pl_std_approach.specials_ind;
-- End Fix - SCR 6709 -- Madhu - 15-Mar-2016
 --Imran CMC - SCR 7276 
 p_record.speed_limit_desc := :pl_std_approach_leg.speed_limit_desc;
 --Imran CMC - SCR 7276
 p_record.aircraft_type := NVL(:pl_std_approach_leg.aircraft_type,' '); --65347
 else
 p_processing_cycle := nvl(rtrim(:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle),:global.processing_cycle); 
 p_cycle := nvl(rtrim(:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle),:global.processing_cycle);--7607
 /* if :global.recent_cycle >= nvl(rtrim(p_processing_cycle),0) then
 p_cycle := p_processing_cycle;
 else
 p_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
 end if;*/ --7607
 p_record.procedure_type := 'F'; -- This is a APPROACH
 p_record.record_type := :parameter.record_type;
 p_record.section := 'P'; -- This is an airport
 p_record.airport_icao := :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao;
 p_record.airport_ident := :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident;
 p_record.gps_fms_ind := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.gps_fms_ind,' ');
 p_record.primary_approach_ind := ' '; -- Validation for this field is done on Validate-Keys
 p_record.alt_1 := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.alt_1,' ');
 p_record.alt_2 := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.alt_2,' ');
 p_record.alt_description := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.alt_description,' ');
 p_record.arc_radius := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_approach_leg.arc_radius*1000),6,'0');
 p_record.atc_ind := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.atc_ind,' ');
 p_record.center_fix_icao_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code;
 p_record.center_fix_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_ident;
 p_record.center_fix_multiple_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_multiple_code;
 p_record.center_fix_section := :pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_section;
 p_record.center_fix_subsection := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ');
 p_record.cycle_data := :pl_tld_approach_leg.cycle_data;
 p_record.file_recno := :pl_tld_approach_leg.file_recno;
 p_record.fix_icao_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_icao_code;
 p_record.fix_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_ident;
 p_record.fix_section_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_section_code;
 p_record.fix_subsection_code := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ');
 p_record.magnetic_course := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4);
 p_record.path_and_termination := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.path_and_termination,' ');
 p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code;
 p_record.recomm_navaid_ident := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident;
 p_record.recomm_navaid_section := :pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section;
 p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ');
 p_record.rho := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_approach_leg.rho*10),4,'0');
 p_record.rnp := :pl_tld_approach_leg.rnp;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 --p_record.rnp2 := :pl_tld_approach_leg.rnp2;
 --p_record.rnp3 := :pl_tld_approach_leg.rnp3;
-- End Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 p_record.route_distance := :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_distance;
 p_record.route_type := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type,' ');
 p_record.sequence_num := lpad(:pl_tld_approach_leg.sequence_num,3,'0');
 p_record.procedure_ident := rpad(:pl_tld_approach.approach_ident,6,' ');
 p_record.speed_limit := lpad(:pl_tld_approach_leg.speed_limit,3,'0');
 p_record.theta := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_approach_leg.theta*10),4,'0');
 p_record.trans_altitude := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_approach_leg.trans_altitude),5,'0');
 p_record.transition_ident := rpad(:pl_tld_approach_leg.transition_ident,5,' ');
 p_record.turn_dir_valid := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ');
 p_record.turn_direction := nvl(:pl_tld_approach_leg.turn_direction,' ');
 if :pl_tld_approach_leg.vertical_angle < 0 then
 p_record.vertical_angle := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(:pl_tld_approach_leg.vertical_angle*100),2),3,'0');
 else
 p_record.vertical_angle := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_approach_leg.vertical_angle*100),4,'0');
 end if;
 p_record.waypoint_desc_code := nvl(rpad(:pl_tld_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4,' '),' ');
 p_record.area_code := :pl_tld_approach.customer_ident;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013
 p_record.fas_ind := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.fas_ind,'');
 p_record.fas_name := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.fas_name,'');
 p_record.lnav_vnav_ind := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.lnav_vnav_ind,'');
 p_record.lnav_vnav_name := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.lnav_vnav_name,'');
 p_record.lnav_ind := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.lnav_ind,'');
 p_record.lnav_name := nvl(:pl_tld_approach.lnav_name,'');
-- End Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013
-- Begin Fix - SCR 6709 -- Madhu - 15-Mar-2016
-- p_record.aircraft_type := :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type; Fix SCR 7426
 p_record.specials_ind := :pl_tld_approach.specials_ind;
-- End Fix - SCR 6709 -- Madhu - 15-Mar-2016
 --Imran CMC - SCR 7276
 p_record.speed_limit_desc := :pl_tld_approach_leg.speed_limit_desc;
 --Imran CMC - SCR 7276

 end if;

ProgramUnit.Name: PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/* Package is created and used by Plotting Function */
PACKAGE PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG IS
 TYPE ltyp_Plot_Process IS RECORD
 (ln_Process_ID PLS_INTEGER,
 ls_DataType VARCHAR2(30));

 TYPE ltyp_Process_ID IS TABLE OF ltyp_Plot_Process
 INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 
 ltab_Process_ID ltyp_Process_ID; 
 ln_Plot_Process_Counter INTEGER;
 ls_Plotting_Function_Dir VARCHAR2(2000);

 Ffi_error BOOLEAN;
 Ffi_error_text VARCHAR2 (2000);
 Ffi_error_code NUMBER;

 FUNCTION Winexec (Cmd IN OUT VARCHAR2, Ucmdshow IN OUT PLS_INTEGER)
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

 FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

 FUNCTION get_process_count
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

 FUNCTION GetInstallationDir
 RETURN VARCHAR2;

 PROCEDURE Exit_coreptdu_plot (Pi_sprocess_id VARCHAR2);

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/* Package is created and used by Plotting Function */
PACKAGE BODY PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG IS
 /* Declare the library and function handles. */
 Getcoreptdupid_lhandle Ora_ffi.Libhandletype;
 Getcoreptdupid_fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
 Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
 get_process_count_fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
 GetInstallationDir_fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;

 -- Private Package Variables
 Lh_kernel32 Ora_ffi.Libhandletype;
 Fh_winexec Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
 
 FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
 PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, Getcoreptdupid_handle, 11265);

 FUNCTION get_process_count_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
 PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, get_process_count_handle, 11265);


 FUNCTION Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype,
 Ls_process_id VARCHAR2)
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
 PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle, 11265);
 
 FUNCTION GetInstallationDir_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
 RETURN VARCHAR2;
 PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, GetInstallationDir_handle, 11265);

 
 FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS
 BEGIN
 RETURN (Getcoreptdupid_handle (Getcoreptdupid_fhandle));
 END Getcoreptdupid;

 FUNCTION get_process_count
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS
 BEGIN
 RETURN (get_process_count_handle (get_process_count_fhandle));
 END get_process_count;

 PROCEDURE Exit_coreptdu_plot (Pi_sprocess_id VARCHAR2)
 AS 
 Ls_return PLS_INTEGER;
 BEGIN
 Ls_return := Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle (Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle,
 Pi_sprocess_id);
 END;
 
 FUNCTION GetInstallationDir
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 BEGIN
 RETURN (GetInstallationDir_handle (GetInstallationDir_fhandle));
 END GetInstallationDir;
 
 PROCEDURE Loadlibrary;

 FUNCTION I_winexec (Functionhandle IN Ora_ffi.Funchandletype,
 Cmd IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 Ucmdshow IN PLS_INTEGER)
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

 PROCEDURE Rg_winexec;
 PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, I_winexec, 11265);

 PROCEDURE Loadlibrary IS
 BEGIN
 BEGIN
 Lh_kernel32 := Ora_ffi.Find_library ('KERNEL32.DLL');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN Ora_ffi.Ffi_error THEN
 Lh_kernel32 := Ora_ffi.Load_library (NULL, 'KERNEL32.DLL');
 END;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 Ffi_error := TRUE ;
 Ffi_error_text := Tool_err.message;
 Ffi_error_code := Tool_err.Code;
 FOR Ierrors IN 1 .. Tool_err.Nerrors
 LOOP
 message ('KERNEL32: ' || Tool_err.message);
 Tool_err.Pop;
 END LOOP;
 Tool_err.CLEAR;
 END Loadlibrary;

 PROCEDURE Rg_winexec IS
 BEGIN
 Fh_winexec := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Lh_kernel32,
 'WinExec',
 Ora_ffi.C_std);
 Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);
 Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_int);
 Ora_ffi.Register_return (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_int);
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 Ffi_error := TRUE ;
 Ffi_error_text := Tool_err.message;
 Ffi_error_code := Tool_err.Code;
 FOR Ierrors IN 1 .. Tool_err.Nerrors
 LOOP
 message ('KERNEL32: ' || Tool_err.message);
 Tool_err.Pop;
 END LOOP;
 Tool_err.CLEAR;
 END Rg_winexec;

 FUNCTION Winexec (Cmd IN OUT VARCHAR2, Ucmdshow IN OUT PLS_INTEGER)
 RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS 
 Rc PLS_INTEGER;
 L_cmd VARCHAR2 (8192) := rpad (substr (nvl (Cmd, ' '), 1, 8192), 8192, chr (0));
 L_ucmdshow PLS_INTEGER := Ucmdshow;
 BEGIN
 Rc := I_winexec (Fh_winexec, L_cmd, L_ucmdshow);
 Cmd := L_cmd;
 Ucmdshow := L_ucmdshow;
 RETURN Rc;
 END Winexec;

BEGIN
 /*
 BEGIN
 Getcoreptdupid_lhandle :=
 Ora_ffi.Load_library ('C:\Program Files\Honeywell Inc., Aviation Services\CorePTDU Tool\','PFUtils.dll');
 
 -- Register the foreign function. 
 Getcoreptdupid_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
 'GetCorePTDUPID',
 Ora_ffi.C_std);
 
 Ora_ffi.Register_return (Getcoreptdupid_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_int);
 
 get_process_count_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
 'get_process_count',
 Ora_ffi.C_std);
 
 Ora_ffi.Register_return (get_process_count_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_int);
 
 GetInstallationDir_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
 'GetInstallationDir',
 Ora_ffi.C_std);
 
 Ora_ffi.Register_return (GetInstallationDir_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);
 
 Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle :=
 Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
 'KillDUApp',
 Ora_ffi.C_std);
 
 Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle,
 Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);

 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END; 
 
 Loadlibrary;
 Rg_winexec;
 */
 NULL;
END PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG;

ProgramUnit.Name: SET_UPDATE_DCR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*
 SCR 0126 --Madhu -- 15-Apr-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form from baseline version of build 229A to 236
 (SCR no's 3476,5359,5332,5294)
 
 Mod 6665: SCR 6665--Madhu--25-Aug-2015
 Mod 6885: SCR 6885--Madhu--14-Oct-2015
*/
PROCEDURE SET_UPDATE_DCR(p_block varchar2,p_record sdv_records.cr_airport_procedure) 
IS
 get_rec_cur cpt_types.refcur;
 get_rec_cur1 cpt_types.refcur; -- fix - scr 5359 - eswar kc - 28-dec-2011
 rtld_approach pl_tld_approach%rowtype;
 rstd_approach pl_std_approach%ROWTYPE;
 rtld_approach_segment pl_tld_approach_segment%ROWTYPE;
 rstd_approach_segment pl_std_approach_segment%ROWTYPE;
 rtld_approach_leg pl_tld_approach_leg%ROWTYPE;
 rstd_approach_leg pl_std_approach_leg%ROWTYPE;
 v_dcr NUMBER := NAME_IN(p_block||'.create_dcr_number');
 v_cycle_data VARCHAR2(4) := SUBSTR(NAME_IN(p_block||'.processing_cycle'),3);
 v_count NUMBER := 0;
BEGIN

 IF p_block like 'PL_STD_APPROACH' 
 THEN
 OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_std_approach WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr; 
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rstd_approach;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
 v_count := v_count + 1;
 IF NVL (:pl_std_approach.gps_fms_ind,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.gps_fms_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.area_code,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.area_code,' ') OR
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.primary_approach_ind,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.primary_approach_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.rnp1,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.rnp1,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.rnp2,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.rnp2,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.rnp3,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.rnp3,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.rnp4,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.rnp4,' ') OR
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 21-Feb-2013
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.fas_ind,' ') != nvl(rstd_approach.fas_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.fas_name,' ') != nvl(rstd_approach.fas_name,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.lnav_vnav_ind,' ') != nvl(rstd_approach.lnav_vnav_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.lnav_vnav_name,' ') != nvl(rstd_approach.lnav_vnav_name,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.lnav_ind,' ') != nvl(rstd_approach.lnav_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.lnav_name,' ') != nvl(rstd_approach.lnav_name,' ') OR
-- End Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 21-Feb-2013
--Begin Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.saaar_approach_ind,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.saaar_approach_ind,' ') OR 
 --NVL (:pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_segment.aircraft_type,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach.specials_ind,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach.specials_ind,' ') 
--End Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu 
 THEN
 
 copy(:global.dcr_NUMBER, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
-- CursOR fetches the legs recORd FOR a particular approach to update the cycle data and navigating to the legs block 
-- and finding out the particular leg recORd based on the create_dcr_number and updating.After updating going back to the calling block. 
 OPEN get_rec_cur1 FOR
 SELECT *
 FROM pl_std_approach_leg
 WHERE airport_ident = rstd_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = rstd_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = rstd_approach.approach_ident
 AND processing_cycle = rstd_approach.processing_cycle
 AND data_supplier = rstd_approach.data_supplier
 ORDER BY route_type,transition_ident,sequence_num;
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur1 INTO rstd_approach_leg;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur1%NOTFOUND;
 GO_BLOCK ('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 IF :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 LOOP
 IF :pl_std_approach_leg.create_dcr_number = rstd_approach_leg.create_dcr_number
 THEN
 COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle, 3),'pl_std_approach_leg.cycle_data');
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur1;
 GO_BLOCK (p_block);
 -- End Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011 
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur;
 ELSIF p_block like 'PL_TLD_APPROACH' 
 THEN
 OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_tld_approach WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rtld_approach;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
 v_count := v_count + 1;
 IF NVL (:pl_tld_approach.gps_fms_ind,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.gps_fms_ind,' ')OR 
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.primary_approach_ind,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.primary_approach_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.rnp1,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.rnp1,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.rnp2,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.rnp2,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.rnp3,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.rnp3,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.rnp4,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.rnp4,' ') OR
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 21-Feb-2013
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.fas_ind,' ') != nvl(rtld_approach.fas_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.fas_name,' ') != nvl(rtld_approach.fas_name,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.lnav_vnav_ind,' ') != nvl(rtld_approach.lnav_vnav_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.lnav_vnav_name,' ') != nvl(rtld_approach.lnav_vnav_name,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.lnav_ind,' ') != nvl(rtld_approach.lnav_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.lnav_name,' ') != nvl(rtld_approach.lnav_name,' ') OR
 -- End Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 21-Feb-2013 
 --Begin Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.saaar_approach_ind,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.saaar_approach_ind,' ') OR 
 -- NVL (:pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach_segment.aircraft_type,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach.specials_ind,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach.specials_ind,' ') 
 --End Fix SCR 6909 --Madhu
 THEN
 copy(:global.dcr_NUMBER, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
-- CursOR fetches the legs recORd FOR a particular approach to update the cycle data and navigating to the legs block 
-- and finding out the particular leg recORd based on the create_dcr_number and updating.After updating going back to the calling block. 
 OPEN get_rec_cur1 FOR
 SELECT *
 FROM pl_tld_approach_leg
 WHERE customer_ident = rtld_approach.customer_ident 
 AND airport_ident = rtld_approach.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = rtld_approach.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = rtld_approach.approach_ident
 AND processing_cycle = rtld_approach.processing_cycle
 AND data_supplier = rtld_approach.data_supplier
 ORDER BY route_type,transition_ident,sequence_num;
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur1 INTO rtld_approach_leg;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur1%NOTFOUND;
 GO_BLOCK ('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 IF :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 LOOP
 IF :pl_tld_approach_leg.create_dcr_number = rtld_approach_leg.create_dcr_number
 THEN
 COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle, 3),'pl_tld_approach_leg.cycle_data');
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur1;
 GO_BLOCK (p_block);
 -- End Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011 
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur; 
 ELSIF p_block like 'PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' 
 THEN
 OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_std_approach_segment WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr; 
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rstd_approach_segment;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
 v_count := v_count + 1;
 IF :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type != rstd_approach_segment.route_type OR
 :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident != rstd_approach_segment.transition_ident OR
 :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type != rstd_approach_segment.aircraft_type OR --65347
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2,' ') 
 THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
 copy(:global.dcr_NUMBER, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011
-- CursOR fetches the legs recORd FOR a particular transaction ident to update the cycle data and navigating to the legs block 
-- and finding out the particular leg recORd based on the create_dcr_number and updating.After updating going back to the calling block. 
 OPEN get_rec_cur1 FOR
 SELECT *
 FROM pl_std_approach_leg
 WHERE airport_ident = rstd_approach_segment.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = rstd_approach_segment.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = rstd_approach_segment.approach_ident
 AND processing_cycle = rstd_approach_segment.processing_cycle
 AND transition_ident = rstd_approach_segment.transition_ident
 AND data_supplier = rstd_approach_segment.data_supplier
 AND route_type = rstd_approach_segment.route_type
 AND aircraft_type = rstd_approach_segment.aircraft_type --65347
 ORDER BY sequence_num;
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur1 INTO rstd_approach_leg;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur1%NOTFOUND;
 GO_BLOCK ('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 IF :pl_std_approach_leg.route_type IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 LOOP
 IF :pl_std_approach_leg.create_dcr_number = rstd_approach_leg.create_dcr_number THEN
--Start SCR 6885
 IF :pl_std_approach_segment.transition_ident != rstd_approach_segment.transition_ident 
 OR :pl_std_approach_segment.route_type != rstd_approach_segment.route_type
 OR :pl_std_approach_segment.aircraft_type != rstd_approach_segment.aircraft_type THEN --65347
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, 'PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
 END IF;
--End SCR 6885
 COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle, 3),'pl_std_approach_leg.cycle_data');
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur1;
 GO_BLOCK (p_block);
 -- End Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011 
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur;
 ELSIF p_block like 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' 
 THEN
 OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_tld_approach_segment WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rtld_approach_segment;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
 v_count := v_count + 1;
 IF :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type != rtld_approach_segment.route_type OR
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident != rtld_approach_segment.transition_ident OR 
 :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type != rtld_approach_segment.aircraft_type OR --65347
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_1,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2,' ') != NVL (rtld_approach_segment.apch_route_qualifier_2,' ') 
 THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
 copy(:global.dcr_NUMBER, p_block||'.update_dcr_number'); 
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011
-- CursOR fetches the legs recORd FOR a particular transaction ident to update the cycle data and navigating to the legs block 
-- and finding out the particular leg recORd based on the create_dcr_number and updating.After updating going back to the calling block. 
 OPEN get_rec_cur1 FOR
 SELECT *
 FROM pl_tld_approach_leg
 WHERE customer_ident = rtld_approach_segment.customer_ident
 AND airport_ident = rtld_approach_segment.airport_ident
 AND airport_icao = rtld_approach_segment.airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = rtld_approach_segment.approach_ident
 AND processing_cycle = rtld_approach_segment.processing_cycle
 AND transition_ident = rtld_approach_segment.transition_ident
 AND data_supplier = rtld_approach_segment.data_supplier
 AND route_type = rtld_approach_segment.route_type
 AND aircraft_type = rtld_approach_segment.aircraft_type --65347
 ORDER BY sequence_num;
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur1 INTO rtld_approach_leg;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur1%NOTFOUND;
 GO_BLOCK ('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 IF :pl_tld_approach_leg.route_type IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 LOOP
 IF :pl_tld_approach_leg.create_dcr_number = rtld_approach_leg.create_dcr_number THEN
--Start SCR 6885
 IF :pl_tld_approach_segment.transition_ident != rtld_approach_segment.transition_ident 
 OR :pl_tld_approach_segment.route_type != rtld_approach_segment.route_type
 OR :pl_tld_approach_segment.aircraft_type != rtld_approach_segment.aircraft_type THEN --65347
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
 END IF;
--End SCR 6885
 COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle, 3),'pl_tld_approach_leg.cycle_data');
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur1;
 GO_BLOCK (p_block);
 -- End Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011 
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur; 
 ELSIF p_block like 'PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG' 
 THEN
 OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_std_approach_LEG WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr; 
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rstd_approach_leg;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%NOTFOUND;
 v_count := v_count + 1; 
 IF p_record.alt_1 != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.alt_1,' ') OR
 p_record.alt_2 != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.alt_2,' ') OR
 p_record.alt_description != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.alt_description,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_leg.arc_radius,0) != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.arc_radius,0) OR 
 p_record.atc_ind != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.atc_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_icao_code,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_ident,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.center_fix_ident,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_multiple_code,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.center_fix_multiple_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_section,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.center_fix_section,' ') OR
 p_record.center_fix_subsection != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.fix_icao_code,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.fix_icao_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.fix_ident,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.fix_ident,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.fix_section_code,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.fix_section_code,' ') OR
 p_record.fix_subsection_code != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ') OR
 p_record.magnetic_course != RPAD (NVL (rstd_approach_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4) OR
 p_record.path_and_termination != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.path_and_termination,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_ident,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_section,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section,' ') OR
 p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ') OR 
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_leg.rho,0) != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.rho,0) OR
 NVL (p_record.rnp,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.rnp,' ') OR
 -- NVL (p_record.rnp2,' ') !=NVL (rstd_approach_leg.rnp2,' ') OR --Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 -- NVL (p_record.rnp3,' ') !=NVL (rstd_approach_leg.rnp3,' ') OR --Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 NVL (p_record.route_distance,' ') != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.route_distance,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_leg.speed_limit,0) != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.speed_limit,0) OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_leg.theta,0) != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.theta,0) OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_leg.trans_altitude,0) != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.trans_altitude,0) OR
 p_record.turn_dir_valid != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ') OR
 p_record.turn_direction != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.turn_direction,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_std_approach_leg.vertical_angle,0) != NVL (rstd_approach_leg.vertical_angle,0) OR
 p_record.waypoint_desc_code != NVL (rpad(rstd_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4,' '),' ') 
 THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
 COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_NUMBER, p_block||'.update_dcr_number'); 
 COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_std_approach.processing_cycle,3),p_block||'.cycle_data'); -- Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011 
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur;
 ELSIF p_block like 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG' 
 THEN
 OPEN get_rec_cur FOR SELECT * FROM pl_tld_approach_LEG WHERE create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
 LOOP
 FETCH get_rec_cur INTO rtld_approach_LEG;
 EXIT WHEN get_rec_cur%notfound;
 v_count := v_count + 1;
 IF p_record.alt_1 !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.alt_1,' ') OR
 p_record.alt_2 !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.alt_2,' ') OR
 p_record.alt_description !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.alt_description,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_leg.arc_radius,0) !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.arc_radius,0) OR
 p_record.atc_ind !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.atc_ind,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_icao_code,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.center_fix_icao_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_ident,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.center_fix_ident,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_multiple_code,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.center_fix_multiple_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.center_fix_section,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.center_fix_section,' ') OR
 p_record.center_fix_subsection !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.center_fix_subsection,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.fix_icao_code,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.fix_icao_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.fix_ident,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.fix_ident,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.fix_section_code,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.fix_section_code,' ') OR
 p_record.fix_subsection_code !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.fix_subsection_code,' ') OR
 p_record.magnetic_course !=rpad(NVL (rtld_approach_leg.magnetic_course,' '),4) OR 
 p_record.path_and_termination !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.path_and_termination,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_icao_code,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_ident,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_ident,' ') OR
 NVL (p_record.recomm_navaid_section,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_section,' ') OR
 p_record.recomm_navaid_subsection !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.recomm_navaid_subsection,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_leg.rho,0) !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.rho,0) OR
 NVL (p_record.rnp,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.rnp,' ') OR
 -- NVL (p_record.rnp2,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.rnp2,' ') OR --Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 -- NVL (p_record.rnp3,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.rnp3,' ') OR --Fix - SCR 3875 - Eswar KC - 04 June 2009 
 NVL (p_record.route_distance,' ') !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.route_distance,' ') OR 
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_leg.speed_limit,0) !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.speed_limit,0) OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_leg.theta,0) !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.theta,0) OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_leg.trans_altitude,0) !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.trans_altitude,0) OR 
 p_record.turn_dir_valid !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.turn_dir_valid,' ') OR
 p_record.turn_direction !=NVL (rtld_approach_leg.turn_direction,' ') OR
 NVL (:pl_tld_approach_leg.vertical_angle,0) != NVL (rtld_approach_leg.vertical_angle,0) OR
 p_record.waypoint_desc_code !=NVL (rpad(rtld_approach_leg.waypoint_desc_code,4,' '),' ') 
 THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');--Mod 6665
 COPY (:global.dcr_NUMBER, p_block||'.update_dcr_number'); 
 COPY (SUBSTR (:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle,3),p_block||'.cycle_data'); -- Fix - SCR 5359 - Eswar KC - 28-Dec-2011 
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 CLOSE get_rec_cur; 
 END IF;

 IF v_count = 0 THEN -- it is a new recORd
--Start Mod 6665 
 IF p_block LIKE '%LEG' THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');
 COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
 ELSIF p_block LIKE '%SEGMENT' THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');
 COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
 ELSE
 COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
 END IF;
--End Mod 6665
 IF p_block LIKE '%LEG' THEN
 COPY (v_cycle_data, p_block||'.cycle_data');
 END IF;
--Start Mod 6665
 ELSIF :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del = 'Y' THEN
 IF p_block LIKE '%LEG' THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_LEG')||'.update_dcr_number');
 ELSIF p_block LIKE '%SEGMENT' THEN
 COPY (:GLOBAL.DCR_NUMBER, RTRIM(p_block,'_SEGMENT')||'.update_dcr_number');
 ELSE
 COPY (:GLOBAL.dcr_number, p_block || '.update_dcr_number');
 END IF;
 :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del := 'N';
 END IF;
--End Mod 6665
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POPULATE_PATH_POINT_RECORD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*
 SCR 0126 --Madhu -- 15-Apr-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form from baseline version of build 229A to 236
 (SCR no's 3476,5359,5332,5294)
 
*/
-- Start Fix -- SCR 5294 -- Neelima U --08/Feb-2012
PROCEDURE POPULATE_PATH_POINT_RECORD(p_airport_ident IN VARCHAR2,
 p_airport_icao IN VARCHAR2,
 p_approach_ident IN VARCHAR2,
 p_customer_ident IN VARCHAR2,
 p_cycle IN NUMBER,
 p_path_type IN VARCHAR2,
 p_record OUT sdv_records.cr_path_point) 
 
IS
pl_std_airport_path_point_rec pl_std_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE;
pl_tLd_airport_path_point_rec pl_tld_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE;
 
 
BEGIN 
 -- IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' THEN
 IF p_path_type = 'S' THEN
 SELECT *
 INTO pl_std_airport_path_point_rec
 FROM pl_std_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = :GLOBAL.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = p_cycle 
 AND airport_ident =p_airport_ident
 AND airport_icao=p_airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = p_approach_ident;
 

 p_record.record_type := :parameter.record_type;
 p_record.cust_area_code := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.area_code;
 p_record.airport_icao := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.airport_icao;
 p_record.airport_ident := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.airport_ident;
 p_record.file_recno := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.file_recno),5,'0');
 p_record.cycle_data := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.cycle_data;
 p_record.approach_ident := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.approach_ident;
 p_record.route_ind := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.route_ind;
 p_record.runway_ident := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.runway_ident;
 p_record.operation_type := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.operation_type),2,'0');
 p_record.sbas_service_provider_ident := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.sbas_service_provider_ident),2,'0'); 
 p_record.reference_path_data_selector := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.reference_path_data_selector;
 p_record.reference_path_identifier := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.reference_path_identifier;
 p_record.performance_designator := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.performance_designator;
 p_record.landing_thr_pt_latitude := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.landing_thr_pt_latitude;
 p_record.landing_thr_pt_longitude := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.landing_thr_pt_longitude;
 IF pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.ellipsoid_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.ellipsoid_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.ellipsoid_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;

 p_record.glide_path_angle := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.glide_path_angle*100),4,'0');
 p_record.fl_path_alig_pt_latitude := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fl_path_alig_pt_latitude;
 p_record.fl_path_alig_pt_longitude := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fl_path_alig_pt_longitude;
 p_record.course_width_at_threshold := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.course_width_at_threshold*100),5,'0');
 p_record.length_offset := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.length_offset;
 p_record.tch_units_indicator := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.tch_units_indicator; 
 IF p_record.tch_units_indicator = 'F' THEN
 p_record.path_point_tch := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.path_point_tch*10),6,'0');
 ELSIF p_record.tch_units_indicator = 'M' THEN
 p_record.path_point_tch := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.path_point_tch*100),6,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.path_point_tch := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.path_point_tch),6,'0');
 END IF; 
 p_record.hal := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.hal*10),3,'0');
 p_record.val := lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.val*10),3,'0');
 p_record.sbas_fas_data_crc_remainder := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.sbas_fas_data_crc_remainder;


 IF pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.fpap_ellipsoid_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.fpap_ellipsoid_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.fpap_ellipsoid_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;
 

 IF pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.fpap_orthometric_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.fpap_orthometric_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.fpap_orthometric_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;

 
 IF pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.ltp_orthometric_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.ltp_orthometric_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.ltp_orthometric_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;

 p_record.approach_type_identifier := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.approach_type_identifier;
 p_record.gnss_channel_number := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.gnss_channel_number;
 p_record.helicopter_procedure_course := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.helicopter_procedure_course;
 p_record.application_type := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.application_type; 
 
 -- ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
 ELSIF p_path_type = 'T' THEN
 
 SELECT *
 INTO pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec
 FROM pl_tld_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = :GLOBAL.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = p_cycle 
 AND customer_ident = p_customer_ident
 AND airport_ident =p_airport_ident
 AND airport_icao=p_airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = p_approach_ident;
 
 p_record.record_type := :parameter.record_type;
 p_record.cust_area_code := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.customer_ident;
 p_record.airport_icao := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.airport_icao;
 p_record.airport_ident := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.airport_ident;
 p_record.file_recno := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.file_recno),5,'0');
 p_record.cycle_data := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.cycle_data;
 p_record.approach_ident := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.approach_ident;
 p_record.route_ind := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.route_ind;
 p_record.runway_ident := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.runway_ident;
 p_record.operation_type := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.operation_type),2,'0');
 p_record.sbas_service_provider_ident := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.sbas_service_provider_ident),2,'0'); 
 p_record.reference_path_data_selector := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.reference_path_data_selector;
 p_record.reference_path_identifier := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.reference_path_identifier;
 p_record.performance_designator := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.performance_designator;
 p_record.landing_thr_pt_latitude := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.landing_thr_pt_latitude;
 p_record.landing_thr_pt_longitude := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.landing_thr_pt_longitude;

 IF pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.ellipsoid_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.ellipsoid_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.ellipsoid_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ellipsoid_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;
 p_record.glide_path_angle := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.glide_path_angle*100),4,'0');
 p_record.fl_path_alig_pt_latitude := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fl_path_alig_pt_latitude;
 p_record.fl_path_alig_pt_longitude := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fl_path_alig_pt_longitude;
 p_record.course_width_at_threshold := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.course_width_at_threshold*100),5,'0');
 p_record.length_offset := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.length_offset;
 p_record.tch_units_indicator := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.tch_units_indicator; 
 IF p_record.tch_units_indicator = 'F' THEN
 p_record.path_point_tch := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.path_point_tch*10),6,'0');
 ELSIF p_record.tch_units_indicator = 'M' THEN
 p_record.path_point_tch := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.path_point_tch*100),6,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.path_point_tch := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.path_point_tch),6,'0');
 END IF; 
 p_record.hal := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.hal*10),3,'0');
 p_record.val := lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.val*10),3,'0');
 p_record.sbas_fas_data_crc_remainder := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.sbas_fas_data_crc_remainder;

 IF pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.fpap_ellipsoid_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.fpap_ellipsoid_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.fpap_ellipsoid_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_ellipsoid_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;
 
 
 IF pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.fpap_orthometric_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.fpap_orthometric_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.fpap_orthometric_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.fpap_orthometric_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;

 
 IF pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height IS NULL THEN
 p_record.ltp_orthometric_height := ' ';
 ELSIF to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height) LIKE '-%' THEN
 p_record.ltp_orthometric_height := '-'||lpad(substr(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height*10),2),5,'0');
 ELSE
 p_record.ltp_orthometric_height := '+'||lpad(to_char(pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.ltp_orthometric_height*10),5,'0');
 END IF;
 
 p_record.approach_type_identifier := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.approach_type_identifier;
 p_record.gnss_channel_number := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.gnss_channel_number;
 p_record.helicopter_procedure_course := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.helicopter_procedure_course;
 p_record.application_type := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.application_type; 
 END IF;
END; 
 
-- End Fix -- SCR 5294 -- Neelima U --08/Feb-2012

ProgramUnit.Name: POPULATE_PATH_POINT_REL_RECORD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*
 SCR 0126 --Madhu -- 15-Apr-2012 
 This SCR is Created to bring up all the updates done to this form from baseline version of build 229A to 236
 (SCR no's 3476,5359,5332,5294)
 
*/
-- Start Fix -- SCR 5294 -- Neelima U --08-Feb-2012

PROCEDURE POPULATE_PATH_POINT_REL_RECORD(p_airport_ident IN VARCHAR2,
 p_airport_icao IN VARCHAR2,
 p_approach_ident IN VARCHAR2,
 p_customer_ident IN VARCHAR2,
 p_cycle IN NUMBER,
 P_path_type IN VARCHAR2,
 p_srec OUT pl_std_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE,
 p_trec OUT pl_tld_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE) IS

pl_std_airport_path_point_rec pl_std_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE;
pl_tLd_airport_path_point_rec pl_tld_airport_path_point%ROWTYPE;

BEGIN
 
 IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' THEN
 SELECT *
 INTO pl_std_airport_path_point_rec
 FROM pl_std_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = :GLOBAL.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = p_cycle 
 AND airport_ident =p_airport_ident
 AND airport_icao=p_airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = p_approach_ident; 
 
 p_srec.airport_ident := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.airport_ident;
 p_srec.airport_icao := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.airport_icao;
 p_srec.approach_ident := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.approach_ident;
 p_srec.runway_ident := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.runway_ident;
 p_srec.validate_ind := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.validate_ind;
 IF :GLOBAL.recent_cycle >= pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.processing_cycle THEN
 p_srec.processing_cycle := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.processing_cycle;
 ELSE
 p_srec.processing_cycle := :GLOBAL.recent_cycle;
 END IF;
 p_srec.data_supplier := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.data_supplier;
 p_srec.create_dcr_number := pl_std_airport_path_point_rec.create_dcr_number; 
 
 ELSE 
 
 SELECT *
 INTO pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec
 FROM pl_tld_airport_path_point
 WHERE data_supplier = :GLOBAL.data_supplier
 AND processing_cycle = p_cycle 
 AND airport_ident =p_airport_ident
 AND airport_icao=p_airport_icao
 AND approach_ident = p_approach_ident
 AND customer_ident = p_customer_ident;
 
 p_trec.airport_ident := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.airport_ident;
 p_trec.airport_icao := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.airport_icao;
 p_trec.approach_ident := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.approach_ident;
 p_trec.runway_ident := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.runway_ident; 
 p_trec.validate_ind := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.validate_ind;
 IF :GLOBAL.recent_cycle >= pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.processing_cycle THEN
 p_trec.processing_cycle := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.processing_cycle;
 ELSE
 p_trec.processing_cycle := :GLOBAL.recent_cycle;
 END IF;
 p_trec.customer_ident := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.customer_ident;
 p_trec.data_supplier := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.data_supplier;
 p_trec.generated_in_house_flag := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.generated_in_house_flag;
 p_trec.create_dcr_number := pl_tld_airport_path_point_rec.create_dcr_number;
 END IF; 
END; 

-- End Fix -- SCR 5294 -- Neelima U --08-Feb-2012

ProgramUnit.Name: CALL_TRANS_IDENT_CHK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012. Restricting '-' along with other characters in Transition ident field. 
PROCEDURE call_trans_ident_chk IS
BEGIN

 chk_segment_trans_ident;
 chk_leg_trans_ident; 
END;
 -- End Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHK_SEGMENT_TRANS_IDENT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012. Restricting '-' along with other characters in Transition ident field. 
PROCEDURE chk_segment_trans_ident IS
v_num number;
v_block varchar2(100);
BEGIN
 If :parameter.record_type='T'
 then 
 v_block := 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT'; 
 else
 v_block := 'PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT'; 
 end if;
 go_block(v_block);
 first_record; 
 loop
 v_num := forms_utilities.Check_trans_ident_ID(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'));
 IF v_num = 0 THEN
 dsp_msg('Transition Ident '||(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'))||' is Invalid for Procedure.'||chr(10)||
 'It contains '' - '' along with other characters.');
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF; 
 If :system.last_record='TRUE'
 Then
 EXIT;
 end if;
 Next_record;
 END LOOP;
 END;
-- End Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.

ProgramUnit.Name: CHK_LEG_TRANS_IDENT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012. Restricting '-' along with other characters in Transition ident field. 
PROCEDURE CHK_LEG_TRANS_IDENT IS
v_num number;
v_block varchar2(100);
BEGIN
 If :parameter.record_type='T'
 then 
 v_block := 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG'; 
 else
 v_block := 'PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG'; 
 end if; 
 go_block(v_block);
 first_record; 
 loop
 v_num := forms_utilities.Check_trans_ident_ID(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'));
 IF v_num = 0 THEN
 dsp_msg('Transition Ident '||(Name_in(v_block||'.TRANSITION_IDENT'))||' is Invalid for Procedure.'||chr(10)||
 'It contains '' - '' along with other characters.');
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF; 
 If :system.last_record='TRUE'
 Then
 EXIT;
 end if;
 Next_record;
 end loop;
END;
-- END Fix - SCR 5799 - Ranjith - 30-Oct-2012.

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_APPNOMAP_SAMAP
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5747 - Eswar KC - 4-Sep-2012

IS

 );
 
 IF v_cvalidind = 'I'

 END IF;

 v_cvalidind := 'Y';
 check_procedures.invalidate_appnomap (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 :pl_std_approach.processing_cycle,

 :parameter.record_type,

 );

 );

 
 IF v_cvalidind = 'I'
 THEN

 END IF;

 check_procedures.invalidate_appnomap (:GLOBAL.data_supplier,
 :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle,
 v_cvalidind,
 :parameter.record_type,

 :pl_tld_approach.approach_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_ident,
 :pl_tld_approach.airport_icao
 );

 IF v_cvalidind = 'I'
 THEN
 v_all_err2 := v_all_err2 || ' * 1164 - ' || get_err_text (1164);
 END IF;
 */
 
 /*
 END IF;
 v_all_err := v_all_err1||v_all_err2;
 RETURN (v_all_err);
END;*/
-- End Fix - SCR 5747 - Eswar KC - 4-Sep-2012
null;

ProgramUnit.Name: FMS_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013
PROCEDURE FMS_DETAILS (p_cInd IN VARCHAR2, p_cName IN VARCHAR2) 
IS
 v_cBlock VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
BEGIN
 IF NAME_IN (v_cBlock||'.'||p_cInd) IS NULL THEN
 COPY ('', v_cBlock || '.' || p_cName);
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 5864.18 - Eswar KC - 04-Mar-2013
 /* 
 ELSIF NAME_IN (v_cBlock||'.'||p_cInd) IS NOT NULL AND NAME_IN (v_cBlock||'.'||p_cInd) IN ('A') THEN
 IF p_cName = 'FAS_NAME' THEN
 COPY ('LPV', v_cBlock || '.' || p_cName);
 ELSIF p_cName = 'LNAV_VNAV_NAME' THEN
 COPY ('LNAV/VNAV', v_cBlock || '.' || p_cName);
 ELSIF p_cName = 'LNAV_NAME' THEN
 COPY ('LNAV', v_cBlock || '.' || p_cName);
 END IF; 
 */
 -- End Fix - SCR 5864.18 - Eswar KC - 04-Mar-2013
 ELSIF NAME_IN (v_cBlock||'.'||p_cInd) IS NOT NULL AND NAME_IN (v_cBlock||'.'||p_cInd) NOT IN ('A','N') THEN
 DSP_MSG ('Allowable values are A or N, Please Correct It.'); 
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
END;
-- End Fix - SCR 5864.08 - Eswar KC - 14-Feb-2013

ProgramUnit.Name: MAGNETIC_COURSE_SDV_PRC
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
--Begin Fix --SCR 4721.03 --Madhu -26-Nov-2013
PROCEDURE Magnetic_Course_SDV_Prc(pi_Record_Type IN VARCHAR2) IS
 ls_Block VARCHAR2(30);
 ls_Magnetic_Course Pl_STD_Approach_Leg.Magnetic_Course%TYPE;
BEGIN
 
 IF pi_Record_Type = 'S' THEN
 ls_Block := 'PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG';
 ELSE
 ls_Block := 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG';
 END IF;
 
 Go_Block(ls_Block);
 FIRST_RECORD;
 LOOP
 ls_Magnetic_Course := Name_In(ls_Block||'.Magnetic_Course');
 IF ls_Magnetic_Course IS NOT NULL THEN
 recsv2.vset_global_constant (1166,ls_Magnetic_Course); 
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
END;
--End Fix --SCR 4721.03 --Madhu -26-Nov-2013

ProgramUnit.Name: GET_CYCLE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
--Begin Fix SCR 7607 --Madhu
FUNCTION get_cycle
 RETURN NUMBER
IS
BEGIN
 IF :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle > :global.max_cycle THEN
 RETURN :global.max_cycle; 
 ELSE
 RETURN NVL (:pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle);
 END IF;
END;
--End fix SCR 7607 --Madhu

RecordGroup.Name: FIX_RG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select airport_ident,fix_ident Ident,fix_icao ICAO,record_type Type,processing_cycle Proc_Cycle,fix_section S,fix_subsection SS,Cust_Ident Cust,Latitude,Longitude
from all_fixes_vw_syn 
where fix_ident = :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.FIX_IDENT
and (:PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO IS NULL or fix_icao = :PARAMETER.FIX_ICAO)
and processing_cycle in (util2.get_previous_cycle(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE),:PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE )
and data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
and validate_ind in ('Y','O')
and ( record_type = 'S' 
OR ( record_type = 'T' AND cust_ident = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT and generated_in_house_flag = 'Y'))
order by Proc_Cycle desc,type,airport_ident

RecordGroup.Name: AIRPORT_RG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT 'STD' TYPE,
 airport_ident,
 airport_icao,
 airport_name
 FROM pl_std_airport
 WHERE airport_ident LIKE
 RTRIM (:pl_tld_approach.airport_ident, '%') || '%'
 AND processing_cycle = :parameter.comp_cycle
 AND data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
 AND validate_ind IN ('Y', 'S', 'H', 'O')
UNION
SELECT 'TLD' TYPE,
 airport_ident,
 airport_icao,
 airport_name
 FROM pl_tld_airport
 WHERE airport_ident LIKE
 RTRIM (:pl_tld_approach.airport_ident, '%') || '%'
 AND processing_cycle = :pl_tld_approach.processing_cycle
 AND data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
 AND validate_ind IN ('Y', 'S', 'H', 'O')
 AND CUSTOMER_IDENT = :pl_tld_approach.CUSTOMER_IDENT
 AND generated_in_house_flag LIKE
 RTRIM (:pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag, 'Y') || '%'
UNION
SELECT 'TLD' TYPE,
 airport_ident,
 airport_icao,
 airport_name
 FROM pl_tld_airport
 WHERE airport_ident LIKE
 RTRIM (:pl_tld_approach.airport_ident, '%') || '%'
 AND processing_cycle = :parameter.comp_cycle
 AND data_supplier = :global.data_supplier
 AND validate_ind IN ('Y', 'S', 'H', 'O')
 AND CUSTOMER_IDENT = :pl_tld_approach.CUSTOMER_IDENT
 AND generated_in_house_flag LIKE
 RTRIM (:pl_tld_approach.generated_in_house_flag, 'Y') || '%'
ORDER BY TYPE, airport_ident

Trigger.Name: ON-MESSAGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 msgnum NUMBER := MESSAGE_CODE; 
 msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := MESSAGE_TEXT; 
 msgtyp VARCHAR2(3) := MESSAGE_TYPE; 
BEGIN 
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
 IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
 CLEAR_MESSAGE;
--Begin Fix SCR 5767 -- Madhu --26-Sep-2012 
 :parameter.upd_rec:='N';
 set_block_property(Name_in('System.Cursor_Block'),update_allowed,property_true);
--End Fix SCR 5767 -- Madhu --26-Sep-2012
 Message('Record has been saved successfully'); 
 ELSIF msgnum in (41051,40350,47316,40353,40352) then -- Fix SCR 7219 - Ashish N - 13-Dec-2017
 null;
 ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
 null;
 ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
 null;
 ELSE 
 display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
END;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 msgnum NUMBER := error_CODE; 
 msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := error_TEXT; 
 msgtyp VARCHAR2(3) := error_TYPE; 
 v_block_name varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block; -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
BEGIN 
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
 IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
 Message('Changes saved successfully'); 
 ELSIF msgnum in (41051, 40350, 47316, 40353, 40352) then -- Fix SCR 7219 - Ashish N -13-Dec-2017
 null;
 ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
 null;
 ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
 null;
 ELSIF msgnum = 40100 then
 clear_message;
 message('At the first record.');
 ELSIF msgnum = 40735 and msgtxt like '%01031%' then
 clear_message;
 dsp_msg(msgtxt||' Insufficient privileges. ');
 ELSIF msgnum = 40501 THEN --Fix SCR 7149 --Madhu--18-Oct-2017
 :control_block.temp_field := 'Y';
 ELSIF msgnum in (40508,40509) then
 dsp_msg(msgtxt||chr(10)||chr(10)||
 'Please check the exact error message from the "Display Error" in the "HELP" menu');
 --raise form_trigger_failure; 
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 ELSIF msgnum IN (40200) THEN
 IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' THEN
 IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
 If :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then
 IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg('Record Cannot be Updated as '||name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT')||' is not associated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
 ELSE
 dsp_msg('Record Cannot be Updated as '||name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT')||' is not associated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
 END IF; 
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 Else
 IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg('STD Record Cannot be Updated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
 ELSE
 dsp_msg('STD Record Cannot be Updated with DCR# '||:global.dcr_number||' Or with processing Cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
 END IF;
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If;
 ELSE
 dsp_msg(msgtxt);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 ELSE
 dsp_msg(msgtxt);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF;
 ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'N' THEN
 null;
 else
 dsp_msg(msgtxt);
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 -- End Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 ELSE 
 display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
 --raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
END;

else

else
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'CRE');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
Initialize_Form;
set_block;
:control_block.pk_segment_change := 'N';
--5699
:control_block.pk_aircraft_change :='N'; --5699
:control_block.pk_route_change :='N'; --5699
:control_block.pk_transition_change :='N'; --5699
--5699
:control_block.count_invalid := 0;
if_from_error_summary;
if_from_leg_search(1);

--Start changes for SCR 3424, Neelima, 24-Nov-2010
:global.library_Access := :parameter.library_Access;
:global.record_type := :parameter.record_type; 
--End changes for SCR 3424, Neelima, 24-Nov-2010
