select max(processing_cycle)
into :global.max_cycle 
from pl_std_airport
where data_supplier = :global.data_Supplier;
--End Fix SCR 7607 --Madhu

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' 
 and :system.COORDINATION_OPERATION not in( 'DELETE_RECORD','COUNT_QUERY','DOWN','NEXT_RECORD')THEN
 CHECK_TO_COMMIT(:system.COORDINATION_OPERATION);
 IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' THEN
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END if;
end if;
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 set_item_property('control_block.std_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 hide_view('STD_OVER');
 :CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
 else 
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_validation_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 hide_view('TLD_OVER');
 :CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERIDE',VISIBLE, property_false);
 end if;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: KEY-NXTREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :System.Cursor_Block LIKE 'PL%APPROACH' AND :System.Form_Status = 'CHANGED' THEN
 CHECK_TO_COMMIT('DOWN');
 IF :System.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' THEN
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
ELSE
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'NXT');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
END IF;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXEQRY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
 if :system.record_status != 'NEW' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
 end if; 
 if :parameter.library_access like 'PRE%' then
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH');
 else
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH');
 end if;
 else
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 go_block('STD_APPROACH');
 else
 go_block('TLD_APPROACH');
 end if;
 end if;
end if; 

if globals.g_where is not null then
 set_block_property(:system.current_block,default_where,globals.g_where);
end if;
corept_execute_query;
if :parameter.library_access like 'PRE%' then
 :control_block.count_invalid := count_invalid_records(:system.cursor_block);
end if;
if get_block_property(:system.current_block,query_hits) > 0 then
 globals.g_where := null;
 set_block_property(:system.current_block,default_where,'');
end if;
-- Start changes for SCR 3424, Neelima, 26-Nov-2010
EXCEPTION 
WHEN OTHERS THEN
NULL;
END;
--End changes for SCR 3424, Neelima, 26-Nov-2010

Trigger.Name: KEY-ENTQRY
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
 if :system.record_status != 'NEW' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
 end if; 
 if :parameter.library_access like 'PRE%' then
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH');
 else
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH');
 end if;
 else
 if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
 go_block('STD_APPROACH');
 else
 go_block('TLD_APPROACH');
 end if;
 end if; 
end if;

globals.g_where := null;
set_block_property(:system.current_block,default_where,'');
corept_enter_query;
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
 unset_query_menu_items;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Begin Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015
IF :parameter.record_type = 'S' OR :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL = 'Y' THEN
 :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';
 CHECK_TO_COMMIT('COMMIT');
ELSE

 Copy_Data_Check_PRC(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle); -- Added for SCR 65036
 IF DCR_Effective_Cycle_Fun(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle) = 'Y' THEN
 CHECK_TO_COMMIT('COMMIT');
 ELSE
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END IF;
--End Fix SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015

Trigger.Name: KEY-DUPREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
 null;
else
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'DUP');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN --Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012 
 if :system.cursor_block like '%APPROACH' then
 message('To copy an approach record, please use the COPY_RECORDS function under the TOOL menu');
 else
 if :system.cursor_block like '%LEG' then
 if name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.PATH_AND_TERMINATION') is not null or
 name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.WAYPOINT_DESC_CODE') is not null then
 create_record;
 end if;
 elsif name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.data_supplier') is not null then
 create_record; 
 end if; 
 duplicate_record;
 if :system.cursor_block like '%LEG' then
 copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.validate_ind');
 end if; 
 copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.create_dcr_number');
 copy(null,:system.cursor_block||'.update_dcr_number');
 :control_block.validated := 'N';
 end if; 
 END IF; -- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-DELREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*
Mod 6665: SCR 6665--Madhu--25-Aug-2015
Mod 6799: SCR 6799--Madhu--20-Nov-2015--:Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL is used to suppress the DCR Effective alert message 
*/
if :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
 null;
else 
 
 if :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
 :parameter.upd_rec:=SET_ACTION_RESTR(name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK') , :GLOBAL.processing_cycle, :GLOBAL.dcr_number,:GLOBAL.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,'DEL');-- Fix - SCR 5767 - Eswar KC - 16-Sep-2012
 declare
 p_table_type varchar2(5) :='M2C';
 v_block varchar2(50):= :system.cursor_block; 
 v_dcr_number number := name_in(substr(v_block,1,15)||'.create_dcr_number');
 v_processing_cycle number(6):= name_in(v_block||'.processing_cycle');
 v_validate_ind varchar2(1) := name_in(substr(v_block,1,15)||'.validate_ind');
 v_status varchar2(10):= :system.form_status;
 ls_Return VARCHAR2(1):= 'Y';
 CURSOR PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
 CURSOR PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
 CURSOR PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
 CURSOR PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
 CURSOR SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.ROUTE_TYPE = :PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE and p.TRANSITION_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT;
 CURSOR SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE AND P.CUSTOMER_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT and P.ROUTE_TYPE = :PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.ROUTE_TYPE and p.TRANSITION_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.TRANSITION_IDENT; 
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 v_exist_MESSAGE varchar2(100);
 v_button number(1);
 begin
 if v_status = 'CHANGED' then -- incase validate_ind is manualy modified by user
 v_validate_ind := refresh_ml_utilities.get_validate_ind(substr(v_block,1,15),v_dcr_number);
 end if;
 --
 if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') then
 IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(v_block,'D') = 'N' THEN
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
 end if;
 --
 if v_block = 'PL_STD_APPROACH' then
 OPEN PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur; 
 FETCH PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur%found ) THEN 
 v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing segments and/or legs.';
 ELSE
 OPEN PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG_cur; 
 FETCH PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG_cur%found ) THEN 
 v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
 END IF;
 CLOSE PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG_cur; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur;
 elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_APPROACH' then
 OPEN PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur; 
 FETCH PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur%found ) THEN 
 v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing segments and/or legs.';
 ELSE
 OPEN PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG_cur; 
 FETCH PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG_cur%found ) THEN 
 v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
 END IF;
 CLOSE PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG_cur; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT_cur; 
 elsif v_block = 'PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' then
 OPEN SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur;
 FETCH SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF (SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur%FOUND ) THEN
 v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
 END IF;
 CLOSE SEGMENT_PL_STD_LEG_cur;
 elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' then
 OPEN SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur;
 FETCH SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF (SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur%FOUND ) THEN
 v_exist_MESSAGE := 'There are existing legs.';
 END IF;
 CLOSE SEGMENT_PL_TLD_LEG_cur;
 end if; 
 --
--Start Mod 6799 
 IF :Parameter.Record_Type = 'T' THEN
 ls_Return:= DCR_Effective_Cycle_Fun(:PL_TLD_APPROACH.processing_cycle,'D');
 IF ls_Return = 'Y' THEN
 :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'Y';
 END IF;
 END IF;
 IF ls_Return = 'N' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
--End Mod 6799
 IF V_EXIST_MESSAGE IS NOT NULL THEN
 if v_block like '%APPROACH' then
 v_button := DISPLAY_ALERT.MORE_BUTTONs('S','DELETE PROCEDURE',
 v_exist_MESSAGE||chr(10)||
 'Pick your choice carefully:'||chr(10)||chr(10),'Delete All','Cancel');
 IF v_button = 1 then
 if v_block = 'PL_STD_APPROACH' then
 DELETE FROM PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
 DELETE FROM PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_STD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_STD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_STD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_STD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE;
 elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_APPROACH' then
 DELETE FROM PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
 DELETE FROM PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG P 
 WHERE P.AIRPORT_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_IDENT and P.AIRPORT_ICAO = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.AIRPORT_ICAO and P.APPROACH_IDENT = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.APPROACH_IDENT and P.DATA_SUPPLIER = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.DATA_SUPPLIER and P.PROCESSING_CYCLE = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.PROCESSING_CYCLE and P.customer_ident = :PL_TLD_APPROACH.CUSTOMER_IDENT;
 end if; 
 else
 :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 elsif v_block like '%SEGMENT' then 
 v_button := DISPLAY_ALERT.MORE_BUTTONs('S','DELETE PROCEDURE',
 v_exist_MESSAGE||chr(10)||
 'Pick your choice carefully:'||chr(10)||chr(10),'Delete Legs too','Delete Segment only','Cancel');
 IF v_button = 1 then 
 if v_block = 'PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' then
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.route_type and
 :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.transition_ident then
 if :PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info is null then
 :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
 delete_record;
 else
 :control_block.std_validation_errors := 'The leg with seq# '||:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.sequence_num||' of the seg: '||:PL_STD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 else
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 end if; 
 end loop;
 first_record;
 set_item_property('control_block.std_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 go_block('PL_STD_APPROACH_SEGMENT');
 elsif v_block = 'PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT' then
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG');
 first_record;
 loop
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.route_type = :PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.route_type and
 :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.transition_ident = :PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT.transition_ident then
 if :PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info is null then
 :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
 delete_record;
 else
 :control_block.tld_validation_errors := 'The leg with seq# '||:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.sequence_num||' of the seg: '||:PL_TLD_APPROACH_LEG.ref_info;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 else
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record; 
 end if; 
 end loop;
 first_record;
 set_item_property('control_block.tld_leg_errors',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 go_block('PL_TLD_APPROACH_SEGMENT');
 end if;
 elsif v_button = 3 then
 :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if; 
 end if;
 else
 if v_block like '%LEG' then
 if DISPLAY_ALERT.MORE_BUTTONs('S','DELETE A LEG',
 'Please be sure that you want to delete this leg.'||chr(10)||chr(10),'Delete','Cancel')=2 then
 :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 end if;
 end if; 
 -- 
 if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') and v_block like '%APPROACH' then
 refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(v_dcr_number);
 end if;
 --
 IF :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
 v_processing_cycle IN (:global.new_processing_cycle,:global.old_processing_cycle) AND
 v_validate_ind IN ('Y','S','H','O') THEN
 if v_block like '%APPROACH' then
 dsp_msg('System is going to refresh this deletion for the master library table.');
 refresh_master_library.refresh_a_record(p_table_type,v_dcr_number,v_processing_cycle,substr(v_block,4,3)||'_APPROACH','I');
 delete_record;
 commit_form;
 refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,'I',substr(v_block,4,3)||'_APPROACH',v_processing_cycle,'D'); -- Added on 01/22/2004
 :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
 dsp_msg('Refresh Successful and the deletion is commited.');
 else
 refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,v_validate_ind,substr(v_block,1,15),v_processing_cycle,'D');
 :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
 delete_record;
 end if;
 else
 :Parameter.Upd_DCR_Del:='Y';--Mod 6665
 delete_record;
 if v_block like '%APPROACH' then
 commit_form;
 :Parameter.EFFECTIVE_DEL := 'N';--Mod 6799
 dsp_msg('The deletion is commited.');
 end if; 
 end if;
 end;
 else
 delete_record;
 end if;
 :control_block.validated := 'N';
end if;

Trigger.Name: PRE-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
if name_in('CONTROL_BLOCK.'||substr(:system.cursor_block,4,3)||'_VALIDATION_ERRORS') is not null
 and name_in(substr(:system.cursor_block,1,7)||'APPROACH.REF_INFO') is not null then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 ls_Form_Id FORMMODULE;
 ls_Data_type VARCHAR2(30);
 ls_process_id WEBUTIL_HOST.process_id;
BEGIN 
 ls_Form_Id := FIND_FORM( lower('AIRPORT_APPROACH'));
 ls_Data_type := TO_CHAR(ls_Form_Id.ID);
 
 IF Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.COUNT >= 1 THEN
 
 FOR plot_exe_no IN Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.FIRST..Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.LAST
 LOOP
 IF Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ls_DataType = ls_Data_type THEN
 --Plot_Global_Pkg.Exit_CorePTDU_Plot(Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ln_Process_ID);
 ls_process_id.handle :=TO_number(Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ln_Process_ID);
 --FORMS11g PITSS
 WEBUTIL_HOST.Terminate_Process(ls_process_id);
 END IF; 
 END LOOP; 
 
 END IF;
 
 IF :SYSTEM.MODE = 'NORMAL' THEN
 CHECK_TO_COMMIT('EXIT');
 END IF;
 
 Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
 
 Exit_form;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-FORM-NAVIGATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' AND Name_In('global.check_save') = 'Y' THEN --5320
 Check_Save_PRC('Airport Approach');
END IF;
